original: dam tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste drug pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste drug pa'o //
translated: The pledge is the Great Vajradhara, the sixth.

original: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga po spro ba dang bsdu ba'i don du bar chad pa'i gnas sngar kun du bzhugs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga po spro ba dang bsdu ba'i don du bar chad pa'i gnas sngar kun du bzhugs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The body of the nature of pristine awareness is the five such as Vairochana, who is the Great Vajradhara of the nature of pristine awareness, abiding in the place of interruption for the sake of emanation and withdrawal.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni drug ba'i gnas na bzhugs pa de'i'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni drug ba'i gnas na bzhugs pa de'i'o //
translated: The his is of him abiding in the sixth place.

original: thigs pa zhes pa ni shin tu rnal 'byor la sogs pas sprul pa'i sku'o zhes pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid zhal gsum @96a * //
analyzed: thigs pa zhes pa ni shin tu rnal 'byor la sogs pas sprul pa'i sku'o zhes pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid zhal gsum @96a * //
translated: The drop is the emanation body by means of the very yoga and so forth. The three faces of the nature of Great Vajradhara are the three bodies.

original: pa phyag drug pa rnams par snang mdzad lta bu ste 'od kyang phyag g-yas kyi gtso bos rdo rje dkar po 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: pa phyag drug pa rnams par snang mdzad lta bu ste 'od kyang phyag g-yas kyi gtso bos rdo rje dkar po 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The six-armed father is like Vairochana, and his light is also held by the principal right hand, which holds a white vajra.

original: de rgyas pa'i don zhes pa ye shes kyi sku sta 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa 'dis rgyas pa la 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rgyas pa'i don zhes pa ye shes kyi sku sta 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa 'dis rgyas pa la 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That is the meaning of ‚Äúincrease,‚Äù because the wisdom body, which is about to be described, increases by this aspect.

original: lce'i rdo rje ni bdud rtsi myang ba 'dir bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga la rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du bsgoms par 'gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir lce'o //
analyzed: lce'i rdo rje ni bdud rtsi myang ba 'dir bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga la rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du bsgoms par 'gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir lce'o //
translated: The vajra of the tongue is the elixir taste. Here, in the rite of the elixir taste, it becomes the meditation on the nature of the vajra of the tongue.

original: rkan gyi padma zhes pa ni padma lta bu ni padma ste /
analyzed: rkan gyi padma zhes pa ni padma lta bu ni padma ste /
translated: The lotus of the palate is like a lotus.

original: byang chub kyi sems phyung ba de 'dzin pa dang bskyod pa gnyis ka'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems phyung ba de 'dzin pa dang bskyod pa gnyis ka'o //
translated: It is both the holding and the shaking of the bodhicitta that is drawn out.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: ci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúJust as the moon in the sky‚Äù and so forth.

original: klad rgyas zhes pa ni klad rgyas de nyid de gzhan ni zad pa'i phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: klad rgyas zhes pa ni klad rgyas de nyid de gzhan ni zad pa'i phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The brain is the nature of the brain, because the other is the nature of the aggregates, elements, and so on that are exhausted.

original: snying gar zhes pa gsang ba ru'o //
analyzed: snying gar zhes pa gsang ba ru'o //
translated: At the heart means in the secret place.

original: de bzhin nyid du 'dir yang snying gar dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni sum cu so gnyis kyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du 'dir yang snying gar dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni sum cu so gnyis kyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: In the same way, here also, the mandala at the heart is the nature of the thirty-two.

original: bu dang zhes pa ni slob ma dang yang slob ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te 'jig rten na yang bu dang tsha bo la sogs par rab tu grags pas so //
analyzed: bu dang zhes pa ni slob ma dang yang slob ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te 'jig rten na yang bu dang tsha bo la sogs par rab tu grags pas so //
translated: Son means the nature of the disciple, the disciple's disciple, and so forth, because in the world they are well known as son, grandson, and so forth.

original: 'dir bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa so sor phan tshun rgyur gyur pa'i tshogs ni dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'dir bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa so sor phan tshun rgyur gyur pa'i tshogs ni dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Here, the assembly of those abiding in the stage of generation, mutually causal for each other, is the mandala.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes pa ni rang gi rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pas lhag par chags pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyis 'gal ba'i tshig gis gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes pa ni rang gi rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pas lhag par chags pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyis 'gal ba'i tshig gis gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The explanation with an intention is because of the contradictory statement with the result of excessive attachment, beginning with one's own vajra.

original: sku gang zhig ces bya ba ni phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi sku thun mong ba ni sku gang zhig ces bya ba 'di brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sku gang zhig ces bya ba ni phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi sku thun mong ba ni sku gang zhig ces bya ba 'di brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: Which body means the common body of Vairocana and so forth abiding in the ten directions. This is to be expressed as which body.

original: rnam pa gzhan dun /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan dun /
translated: Otherwise,

original: sku gang zhes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sku gang zhes par 'gyur ro //
translated: it would be ‚Äúwhose body?‚Äù

original: gang yang sku gang zhig ni sku'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: gang yang sku gang zhig ni sku'i ngo bo'o //
translated: And ‚Äúwhose body?‚Äù would be the nature of the body.

original: phung po nye bar mtshon pa'i don du sku'i sgra de la ltos pa nyid la gang zhig ces brjod par bya ste sku gang zhig ni phung po gang zhig ces bya bar mngon par dgongs so //
analyzed: phung po nye bar mtshon pa'i don du sku'i sgra de la ltos pa nyid la gang zhig ces brjod par bya ste sku gang zhig ni phung po gang zhig ces bya bar mngon par dgongs so //
translated: The word ‚Äúbody‚Äù is used in the sense of the aggregates, and it is in reference to that that ‚Äúwhose‚Äù is said, and it is understood that ‚Äúwhose body?‚Äù means ‚Äúwhose aggregates?‚Äù

original: sangs rgyas sku'i ngo bo yis ni phyogs bcu na dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur sgrub pa po'i lus gcig pus rgyur gyur cig ces pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku'i ngo bo yis ni phyogs bcu na dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur sgrub pa po'i lus gcig pus rgyur gyur cig ces pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúMay the body of the Buddha, by the essence of the body, be the cause for the body of the practitioner to be the body of Vairocana, abiding in the ten directions and three times.‚Äù

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgya cher 'grel pas sku'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgya cher 'grel pas sku'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
translated: The commentary explains ‚Äúof all the Buddhas‚Äù and so forth extensively.

original: gsung dang thugs dag la yang ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin du sbyar bar @96b bya'o ;
analyzed: gsung dang thugs dag la yang ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin du sbyar bar @96b bya'o ;
translated: It should be applied to the speech and mind as they occur.

original: / kun du bzang po ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: / kun du bzang po ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSamantabhadra‚Äù is Akshobhya.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin nyid la sogs pa ma brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin nyid la sogs pa ma brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúJust as the words‚Äù means that the nature of mind and so forth is not expressed.

original: da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchog sgrub pa la gnas pa ni /
analyzed: da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchog sgrub pa la gnas pa ni /
translated: Now, beginning with ‚Äúthis,‚Äù the stage of accomplishing the supreme

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'o //
translated: is the stage of completion.

original: rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su shes pas so //
analyzed: rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su shes pas so //
translated: By knowing the nature of the complete and incomplete,

original: sgo nga las skyes ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas sems can ma lus pa mngon par brjod de /
analyzed: sgo nga las skyes ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas sems can ma lus pa mngon par brjod de /
translated: beginning with ‚Äúborn from an egg,‚Äù all sentient beings are referred to.

original: skye gnas las ma byung ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: skye gnas las ma byung ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: There is no one who is not born from a womb.

original: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'jig rten du grags pa'i sku la sogs pa'i byed pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'jig rten du grags pa'i sku la sogs pa'i byed pa bstan pa'o //
translated: Beginning with ‚Äúthis,‚Äù the function of the body and so on that is renowned in the world is explained.

original: brtag pa'i gzhir gyur pa zhes pa ni lus la sogs pa ni sems can gyi gzhi med pa la'o //
analyzed: brtag pa'i gzhir gyur pa zhes pa ni lus la sogs pa ni sems can gyi gzhi med pa la'o //
translated: The basis of investigation is the body and so on, which are the basis of sentient beings.

original: gcig pu gang yin pa zhes pa la sogs pas sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gcig pu nyid do //
analyzed: gcig pu gang yin pa zhes pa la sogs pas sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gcig pu nyid do //
translated: Beginning with ‚Äúthe one,‚Äù the nature of mind is one.

original: gang ci 'dra ba zhes pa ni rang gi ngo bo gang zhig gnyug ma'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: gang ci 'dra ba zhes pa ni rang gi ngo bo gang zhig gnyug ma'i bdag nyid do //
translated: What kind of? Whatever is its own nature, which is the innate nature.

original: bdag gi zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'i'o //
analyzed: bdag gi zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'i'o //
translated: Of me means of the practitioner.

original: de 'dra bar zhes pa ni sems can thams cad kyi ji 'dra bar brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dra bar zhes pa ni sems can thams cad kyi ji 'dra bar brjod pa'o //
translated: Like that means like all sentient beings.

original: ci ltar byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci ltar byas nas she na /
translated: How is it done?

original: mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúin space,‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'dis ci zhig brjod par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'dis ci zhig brjod par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is expressed by this?

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúthis,‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'dir byin gyis brlab pa ni sku la sogs pa'i thugs kyi rang bzhin nyid du 'dod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir thugs byin brlab thog mar gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dir byin gyis brlab pa ni sku la sogs pa'i thugs kyi rang bzhin nyid du 'dod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir thugs byin brlab thog mar gsungs so //
translated: Here, the consecration is said to be the nature of the mind of body and so forth, and therefore the consecration of the mind is taught first.

original: gsung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngags zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gsung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngags zhes pa ni /
translated: With regard to ‚Äúspeech,‚Äù and so forth, the mantra is

original: 'don cing zhes bya ba ni mi la sogs pa'i mngon par brjod pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'don cing zhes bya ba ni mi la sogs pa'i mngon par brjod pa rnams so //
translated: the recitation of the names of Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ and so forth.

original: sku dang gsung dag thugs kyi nang du gtogs pa'i don du gsungs pa sku zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dag thugs kyi nang du gtogs pa'i don du gsungs pa sku zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: The meaning of body and speech being included within the mind is taught by ‚Äúbody,‚Äù and so forth.

original: sku la dmigs pas sku'o //
analyzed: sku la dmigs pas sku'o //
translated: The body is the object of observation of the body.üîΩ

original: sku zhes bya ba 'og nas 'chad pa ni sku zhes bya ba'i sgras ni /
analyzed: sku zhes bya ba 'og nas 'chad pa ni sku zhes bya ba'i sgras ni /
translated: The body is due to the observation of the body.üîΩThe body is explained below.üîΩThe word ‚Äúbody‚Äù is used because it is the one that thinks.

original: gang zhig sems par byed pa ste de nyid kyi phyir sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te yongs su gyur pa ni de ngo bos rdzogs pa ste de ni sku dang gsungs dang thugs so //
analyzed: gang zhig sems par byed pa ste de nyid kyi phyir sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te yongs su gyur pa ni de ngo bos rdzogs pa ste de ni sku dang gsungs dang thugs so //
translated: Therefore, the body, speech, and mind are completely transformed into the nature of that [vajra].üîΩThat mind is to be expressed as the body, speech, and mind.

original: thugs de nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs su mngon par brjod par bya'o zhes mngon par dgongs so //
analyzed: thugs de nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs su mngon par brjod par bya'o zhes mngon par dgongs so //
translated: This is the intended meaning.

original: sems can thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngags kyi sku zhes pa sngar brjod pa ni 'dir sprel lo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngags kyi sku zhes pa sngar brjod pa ni 'dir sprel lo //
translated: With regard to all sentient beings, etc., the mantra body mentioned earlier is to be connected here.

original: sngags kyi sku ni ngag gi tshogs dang / @97a * //
analyzed: sngags kyi sku ni ngag gi tshogs dang / @97a * //
translated: The mantra body is the collection of speech.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang sngags kyi sku ste /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang sngags kyi sku ste /
translated: The body, speech, and mind are also the mantra body.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs las tshig dang sems dag dang / tshig dang lus dag tu mngon par brjod do //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs las tshig dang sems dag dang / tshig dang lus dag tu mngon par brjod do //
translated: From the body, speech, and mind, words and thoughts are expressed, and from words and thoughts, the body and speech are expressed.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de dag ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de dag ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚Äújust that‚Äù

original: sgo nga las skyes pa rnams kyi sgra ni sngags te gsung yin no //
analyzed: sgo nga las skyes pa rnams kyi sgra ni sngags te gsung yin no //
translated: The sound of those born from eggs is mantra, which is speech.

original: de'i rang bzhin de nyid rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de nyid rdo rje'o //
translated: That very nature is a vajra.

original: sku gang yin pa zhes pa ni sku'i sgras gsung dang ldan pa'i phung po'o //
analyzed: sku gang yin pa zhes pa ni sku'i sgras gsung dang ldan pa'i phung po'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhatever body‚Äù is the aggregate endowed with speech, by the word ‚Äúbody.‚Äù

original: gsung byin gyis brlab pa mngon par brjod nas sku byin gyis brlab pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gsung byin gyis brlab pa mngon par brjod nas sku byin gyis brlab pa gsungs pa /
translated: Having stated the consecration of speech, he states the consecration of body:

original: gsung zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'di'i don tshig tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs la /
analyzed: gsung zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'di'i don tshig tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs la /
translated: ‚ÄúSpeech‚Äù and so forth. The meaning of this is stated in the words ‚Äúin the words‚Äù and so forth.

original: tshig tu brjod pa ni dag tu rab tu 'byung ba nyid do //
analyzed: tshig tu brjod pa ni dag tu rab tu 'byung ba nyid do //

original: sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa'i sgra'i tshogs rab tu 'jug pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa'i sgra'i tshogs rab tu 'jug pas zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: gang zhes pa ni brdar btags par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhes pa ni brdar btags par gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhatever‚Äù is the conventional designation.

original: sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa'i phung po'i tshogs pa sgo nga las skyes pa'i phung po'i rnam pa rang rang so so de dang de'i sems skyes so //
analyzed: sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa'i phung po'i tshogs pa sgo nga las skyes pa'i phung po'i rnam pa rang rang so so de dang de'i sems skyes so //
translated: The mind of the individual aspects of the aggregates of the egg-born, etc., is born.

original: de lta bu zhes pa ni sngags byin gyis rlob par byed pa la ltos pa'i tshig ste /
analyzed: de lta bu zhes pa ni sngags byin gyis rlob par byed pa la ltos pa'i tshig ste /

analyzed: ji lta bu zhes pa la sogs pa la 'chad par 'gyur ba la bar ma chad par spel lo //
translated: As to what kind, etc., it is to be supplied with the explanation that will come.

original: gang zhes pa la sogs pa'i bshad pas sngar gyi dang sbrel lo //
analyzed: gang zhes pa la sogs pa'i bshad pas sngar gyi dang sbrel lo //
translated: The explanation of what and so on is to be supplied with the previous [words].

original: de nyid kyi phyir bshad ma thag pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bshad ma thag pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: For that very reason, it is said immediately after the explanation, and so on.

original: sems can thams cad kyi zhes pa ni sngar gsungs pa'i mi rnams dang phyis 'chad pa'i sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi zhes pa ni sngar gsungs pa'i mi rnams dang phyis 'chad pa'i sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa rnams so //

analyzed: mi dang sgo nga la sogs pa las skyes pa rnams nyid ni de rnams nyid kyi'o //

original: rdo rje'i sku yang zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku yang zhes pa ni /
translated: The vajra body also means

analyzed: rang bzhin las de mi dang sgong skyes la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags kyi sgo dag gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: bdag kyang de dang 'dra zhes pa ni sku byin gyis rlob par byed pa la ltos nas 'dis bdag med de rnams kyi sngags kyi sku ngag ro mnyam pa nyid du so sor rtogs pa nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: bdag kyang de dang 'dra zhes pa ni sku byin gyis rlob par byed pa la ltos nas 'dis bdag med de rnams kyi sngags kyi sku ngag ro mnyam pa nyid du so sor rtogs pa nyid du bstan to //

original: slar yang ni mi la sogs pa rnams sngags kyi sku dag so so skye bo'i gnas skabs na yang yod pa ma yin nam gnyis su med pa nyid ci ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: slar yang ni mi la sogs pa rnams sngags kyi sku dag so so skye bo'i gnas skabs na yang yod pa ma yin nam gnyis su med pa nyid ci ltar yin zhe na /
translated: Again, if humans and so on have the mantra body, is it not the case that they exist in the state of ordinary beings? How is there non-duality?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs las 'byung ba gang yin pa de tshad mar bstan pa'i phyir rab tu @97b 'byung zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs las 'byung ba gang yin pa de tshad mar bstan pa'i phyir rab tu @97b 'byung zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: rab tu 'byung ba da ltar ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu 'byung ba da ltar ba'o //
translated: Arising is the present.

original: rtag pa nyid du zhes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus gnyis ston no //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid du zhes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus gnyis ston no //

analyzed: ngo bo nyid ni bde ba gnyis po'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //

original: rnam pa gzhan du rim pa las brgal bar bya ba ma yin no zhes 'da' bar dka' ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du rim pa las brgal bar bya ba ma yin no zhes 'da' bar dka' ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //

original: bstan to zhes bya ba ni lung du'o //
analyzed: bstan to zhes bya ba ni lung du'o //
translated: It is taught in the scriptures.üîΩThe equality of the mind, etc., of the adepts with the Great Vajradhara, who is the result, is taught by the equality of taste of the mind, etc., of the adepts with the mind, etc., of the Great Vajradhara, who is the result.üîΩThe equality of taste of the mind, etc., of the adepts with the mind, etc., of the Great Vajradhara, who is the result, is taught by the equality of taste of the mind, etc., of the Great Vajradhara, who is the result, with the mind, etc., of the adepts.

original: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi zhes pa ni /
translated: All yogis means

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rim pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rim pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: the yogis of the two stages of Vairochana and so forth.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa nyid dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa nyid dkyil 'khor ro //

original: de la 'jug pa'i rim pa'am rtogs pa'i rim pa des so //
analyzed: de la 'jug pa'i rim pa'am rtogs pa'i rim pa des so //
translated: By that process of entering into it, or the process of realization.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes pa ste /
translated: The limit of reality

original: yang dag pa'i sgras 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i phung po la sogs pa nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i sgras 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i phung po la sogs pa nye bar mtshon par bya'o //

analyzed: mtha' ni de rnams mthar thug pa dang / de rnams 'gog pa zhes pa'i don no //

analyzed: bskyed pa zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku ni sbrul pa'i sku'o //

original: de gzugs phung rtogs pa me long dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pas don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs shing lhag ma rang bzhin snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam gzhag rim par gsungs pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: de gzugs phung rtogs pa me long dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pas don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs shing lhag ma rang bzhin snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam gzhag rim par gsungs pa'i rim pas so //
translated: The mirror is the realization of the form aggregate, and so on, in sequence, and the ultimate truth is realized in sequence. The remaining is the presentation of the nature, and so on, in sequence.

original: de rjes su dran pa ni 'od gsal rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de rjes su dran pa ni 'od gsal rtogs pa'o //

original: rgyas par bshad pa dam tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: rgyas par bshad pa dam tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
translated: The extensive explanation is the pledge, and so on.

original: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'i bya rog gi mig bzhin du snga mar 'jug pa sbrel lo //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'i bya rog gi mig bzhin du snga mar 'jug pa sbrel lo //

original: byis pa zhes pa la sogs pas mngal dang phyi rol du byung ba'i rang gi ngo bo ston par byed do //
analyzed: byis pa zhes pa la sogs pas mngal dang phyi rol du byung ba'i rang gi ngo bo ston par byed do //

original: gnas pa zhes pa ni 'jig rten du dang @98a * //
analyzed: gnas pa zhes pa ni 'jig rten du dang @98a * //

original: dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'chang chen po de lhan cig gnyis su med par gyur pas reg bya'i yul nyams su myong bar byed do /

original: 'jig rten du yang gsal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten du yang gsal lo //

original: bsad na zhes pa la sogs pa'i don bshad pa ni /
analyzed: bsad na zhes pa la sogs pa'i don bshad pa ni /

analyzed: ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor pa la 'di dag so sor gsungs so //

original: srog rtsol gnas pa ni /
analyzed: srog rtsol gnas pa ni /
translated: The abiding of prƒÅ·πáa and ƒÅyƒÅma

original: dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i dbang gis phung po la sogs pa'i tshogs kyang gnas pa'i phyir dang / de dag bcad nas srog rtsol 'gog pas don dam pa'i bden pa 'chi ba gnyug ma'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i dbang gis phung po la sogs pa'i tshogs kyang gnas pa'i phyir dang / de dag bcad nas srog rtsol 'gog pas don dam pa'i bden pa 'chi ba gnyug ma'i ngo bo'o //
translated: is the ultimate truth, the innate nature of death, because the aggregates and so forth abide by the power of exhalation and inhalation, and because prƒÅ·πáa and ƒÅyƒÅma are stopped by cutting them off.

original: 'jug par bya'o zhes pa rlung dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i bdag nyid can ni snang ba'i ye shes la rab tu zhugs ma thag tu kun du snang ba la sogs pa'i snang ba gsum 'od gsal du zhugs pa so so rang gi rig pas shes par bya'o
analyzed: 'jug par bya'o zhes pa rlung dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i bdag nyid can ni snang ba'i ye shes la rab tu zhugs ma thag tu kun du snang ba la sogs pa'i snang ba gsum 'od gsal du zhugs pa so so rang gi rig pas shes par bya'o
translated: ‚Äú One should enter‚Äù means that the wind, which has the nature of exhalation and inhalation, should be known by one‚Äôs own awareness as entering into the luminous clarity of the three appearances, such as the all-appearance and so forth, immediately upon entering into the pristine consciousness of appearance.

original: // 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa'i don gyis bsdus pa'i don ston par byed do //
analyzed: // 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa'i don gyis bsdus pa'i don ston par byed do //
translated: ‚Äú In this way‚Äù and so forth teach the meaning of the summarized meaning.

original: zhing las dang tshang las dang 'byor pa mtshang ba la sogs pa gal te brtul ba can gyi brtson 'grus ma yin na rtag tu de la spro ba'o //
analyzed: zhing las dang tshang las dang 'byor pa mtshang ba la sogs pa gal te brtul ba can gyi brtson 'grus ma yin na rtag tu de la spro ba'o //
translated: If it is not the striving of one who is self-controlled, then it is always delighting in that.

original: 'gro ba'i rgyud du ste 'khor ba pa'i skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa'i rim pas /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i rgyud du ste 'khor ba pa'i skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa'i rim pas /
translated: In the stream of beings, in the process of birth, abiding, and destruction of those in cyclic existence.

original: dus kyi bya ba byed pa ni /üîΩ'chi ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o zhes pa ni rab tu gsal ba'o //
analyzed: dus kyi bya ba byed pa ni / 'chi ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o zhes pa ni rab tu gsal ba'o //
translated: The activity of time isüîΩdeath, and so on. This is very clear.

original: rnam par rtog pas 'chi 'o zhes brjod pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas 'chi 'o zhes brjod pa'o //

original: dngos po de ni 'dir bstan pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes mngon par brjod de /
analyzed: dngos po de ni 'dir bstan pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes mngon par brjod de /
translated: That entity is taught here as the perfection of wisdom, which is the expression.

original: 'chi ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi skye ba yang ba ste bskyed pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi skye ba yang ba ste bskyed pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Not only is death the perfection of wisdom, but birth is also the perfection of wisdom, that is, the generation.

original: de rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir skye ba'o //
analyzed: de rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir skye ba'o //
translated: It is birth because it engages in that.

original: gnas pa ni 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gnas pa ni 'dod pa'o //
translated: Abiding is desire.

original: dran pa ni ye shes te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste byang chub sangs rgyas nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: dran pa ni ye shes te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste byang chub sangs rgyas nyid kyang ngo //
translated: Mindfulness is intuition, the perfection of wisdom, and also enlightenment, buddhahood.

original: kun gzhi thim pa ni phung po la sogs pa'i chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo rnams de'i bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: kun gzhi thim pa ni phung po la sogs pa'i chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo rnams de'i bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: The dissolution of the ground of all means that all phenomena such as the aggregates, etc., which are of the nature of the Buddha, are of its very essence.

original: grol ba ni sdug bsngal ma lus par nges par thar pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grol ba ni sdug bsngal ma lus par nges par thar pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Liberation is the cause of the certain deliverance of all suffering.

original: bsam pa thams cad ni mngon par 'dod pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa ste chos kyi sku'o zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad ni mngon par 'dod pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa ste chos kyi sku'o zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: The fulfillment of all wishes is the Dharma Body, which is the cause of the fulfillment of all desired aims.

original: gnas skabs tha dad pas bshad pa'i phyir slar yang dgongs pa @98b bshad pa'o //
analyzed: gnas skabs tha dad pas bshad pa'i phyir slar yang dgongs pa @98b bshad pa'o //

analyzed: mtha' ni mthar thug pa ste dngos po med pa zhes pa ji srid par ro //

original: phyin pa ni song bar gyur pa ste /
analyzed: phyin pa ni song bar gyur pa ste /

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is

analyzed: ma skyes pa la 'chi ba med //

translated: Because it is said that ‚Äúit is to be distinguished,‚Äù etc., the j√±ƒÅnakƒÅya, which has the nature of the three intuitions, is taught first as the object of observation, because it is the object of observation of clearlight transparency.

analyzed: 'jug pa'i bdag nyid can 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo gsungs pa /

analyzed: rang bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: byang chub ni 'od gsal ba'i ye shes so //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mngon par zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //

original: 'di bdag ces pa la ;
analyzed: 'di bdag ces pa la ;

analyzed: rtog pa gnyis po zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i 'bras bu dang rgyu'i rtog pa gnyis so //

analyzed: 'od gsal ba ni dri ma med pa'o //

analyzed: 'od gsal ba yang de yin la 'jug pa yang yin pas 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa zhes pa'o //

original: zag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir /

analyzed: 'dod pa'i zag pa dang / srid pa'i zag pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa nyid rnams dang bral ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //

translated: Therefore, he says vajra and so on.

original: de zhes pa ni 'od gsal bar ston par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang rang bzhin dang snang ba'i rim pas gsungs pas ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de zhes pa ni 'od gsal bar ston par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang rang bzhin dang snang ba'i rim pas gsungs pas ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word that is used because it reveals clear light, and because it is the revealer by teaching with the stages of nature and appearance.

original: @101b dbang po'i mchog ni yid kyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: @101b dbang po'i mchog ni yid kyi dbang po'o //
translated: The supreme sense faculty is the mental faculty.

original: tsam gyi sgras dbang po gzhan ni gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid du dgag pa'i don no //
analyzed: tsam gyi sgras dbang po gzhan ni gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid du dgag pa'i don no //
translated: The word merely is for the purpose of negating that the other sense faculties are objects of apprehension.

original: gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pas na zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pas na zhes pa ni /
translated: The meaning of because of being an object of apprehension is as follows.

original: bla ma'i byin gyi rlabs las dgongs pa tsam gyis zung du 'jug pa nyams su myong ba nyid kyi phyir dang so so rang gi rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bla ma'i byin gyi rlabs las dgongs pa tsam gyis zung du 'jug pa nyams su myong ba nyid kyi phyir dang so so rang gi rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the union is experienced merely through the intention of the guru's blessing and because it is to be known by oneself.

original: thams cad kyi zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi zung 'jug gi sku ni lha mo'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ma byung ba'i phyir rdo rje'i sgras rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sprul pa'i sku la 'dir bshad do //
analyzed: thams cad kyi zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi zung 'jug gi sku ni lha mo'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ma byung ba'i phyir rdo rje'i sgras rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sprul pa'i sku la 'dir bshad do //
translated: All means that the body of union of Vairochana and so forth is not produced from the union with the goddess, and therefore the vajra body is explained here as the emanation body of Vajradhara the Great.

original: mchog tu dga' ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis so ;
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis so ;
translated: Supreme joy is by the nature of suchness.

original: / dbang phyug brgyad ces pa ni /
analyzed: / dbang phyug brgyad ces pa ni /
translated: The eight masteries are:üîΩThe mastery of body, the mastery of speech,üîΩand likewise the mastery of mind,üîΩthe mastery of miracles, the mastery of going everywhere,

original: sku'i dbang phyug gsung gi dbang phyug dang // de bzhin nyid du'ang thugs kyi dbang phyug dang // rdzu 'phrul kun du 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang // 'dod pa byed po yon tan brgyad pa rnams //
analyzed: sku'i dbang phyug gsung gi dbang phyug dang // de bzhin nyid du'ang thugs kyi dbang phyug dang // rdzu 'phrul kun du 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang // 'dod pa byed po yon tan brgyad pa rnams //
translated: the mastery of desire, and the mastery of action.

original: zhes so // de nyid shes pa ye shes kyi sku'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de nyid shes pa ye shes kyi sku'o //
translated: The knowledge of thatness is the body of wisdom.

original: sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: The passage beginning with the words ‚Äúthe fleshly eye‚Äù continues:

original: sha ra dva ti'i bu sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do //
analyzed: sha ra dva ti'i bu sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do //
translated: ≈öƒÅradvatƒ´putra, there are those who have the fleshly eye and see a hundred leagues.üîΩThere are those who see a thousand leagues.

original: ji srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po mthong ba yod do //
analyzed: ji srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po mthong ba yod do //
translated: There are those who see a great trichiliocosm.

original: lha'i mig gis rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams gyi lha'i mig nas ji srid du 'og min gang yin pa de rab tu shes pa yod kyi /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams gyi lha'i mig nas ji srid du 'og min gang yin pa de rab tu shes pa yod kyi /
translated: There are those who see with the divine eye of the gods of the Four Great Kings up to those of the Akani·π£·π≠ha gods.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig ni lha rnams gang gis kyang mi shes so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig ni lha rnams gang gis kyang mi shes so //
translated: But the divine eye of the bodhisattva is not known to any of the gods.

original: lha'i mig des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: lha'i mig des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: With that divine eye, he knows the deaths and rebirths of beings in the eastern direction in as many world systems as there are sand particles in the Ga·πÖgƒÅ river.

original: ji srid du phyogs bcu rnams su'o //üîΩshes rab kyi mig gis 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas sam /
analyzed: ji srid du phyogs bcu rnams su'o // shes rab kyi mig gis 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas sam /
translated: And so on up to the ten directions.

original: dge ba'am mi dge ba'i chos ci 'ang mi shes te /
analyzed: dge ba'am mi dge ba'i chos ci 'ang mi shes te /
translated: With the eye of wisdom, he does not know any conditioned or unconditioned, virtuous or nonvirtuous phenomena at all.

original: de lta bu la sogs pa'i dbye ba du mas yang dag par bsdus pa'i chos rnams la mthong ba'am thos pa rnam par ma shes so zhes ba 'di ni shes rab kyi mig go ;
analyzed: de lta bu la sogs pa'i dbye ba du mas yang dag par bsdus pa'i chos rnams la mthong ba'am thos pa rnam par ma shes so zhes ba 'di ni shes rab kyi mig go ;
translated: The eye of wisdom is the knowledge that one has not seen or heard or cognized in any way the dharmas that are included in the various categories such as those above.

original: / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi spyan gang yin pa ni /
analyzed: / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi spyan gang yin pa ni /
translated: The eye of Dharma of the bodhisattva is pure.

original: gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
translated: This person is a follower of faith.

original: 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o //
translated: This person is a follower of the Dharma.

original: 'di'i dbang po lnga rnams skyed par 'gyur te /üîΩdbang po 'di rnams kyi bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'chad par byed pa chos kyi spyan gyis de lta bu @102a * //
analyzed: 'di'i dbang po lnga rnams skyed par 'gyur te / dbang po 'di rnams kyi bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'chad par byed pa chos kyi spyan gyis de lta bu @102a * //
translated: This person will generate the five faculties.

original: la sogs pa rab tu shes te /üîΩbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyan gang gis ma mthong ba'am ma thos ba'am /
analyzed: la sogs pa rab tu shes te / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyan gang gis ma mthong ba'am ma thos ba'am /
translated: The eye of Dharma of the bodhisattva is the knowledge that, by means of the uninterrupted concentration of these faculties, one will attain the eye of Dharma that will know such things as the following.

original: mi dran pa'am ming shes ba cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: mi dran pa'am ming shes ba cung zad kyang med do //
translated: The eye of the bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva is such that there is nothing at all that is not seen or heard or cognized or known.

original: rnam pa kun gyis yongs su dag pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mig ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'dir rdo rje 'chang chen po yang ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa kun gyis yongs su dag pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mig ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'dir rdo rje 'chang chen po yang ngo //
translated: This is the eye of the Buddha, which is completely pure in every way. The perfect Buddha here is also the Great Vajradhara.

original: yongs su shes pa rgyas pa'i phyir rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su shes pa rgyas pa'i phyir rgyas pa'o //
translated: It is extensive because of the extensiveness of the knowledge.

original: 'dus ma byas ni nam mkha' dang so sor rtog pa'i 'gog pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas ni nam mkha' dang so sor rtog pa'i 'gog pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The unconditioned is space, the cessation of discrimination, and so forth.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: It is of definitive meaning.

original: mi 'gyur ba ni 'jigs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba ni 'jigs pa med pa ste /
translated: It is unchanging, which is fearless,

original: skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jigs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jigs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is free from arising, abiding, and destruction.

original: thams cad kyi zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: All means of Vairochana and so forth.

original: sems can thams cad ces pa ni don du gnyer ba dang chos la sogs pa don du gnyer ba rnams so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad ces pa ni don du gnyer ba dang chos la sogs pa don du gnyer ba rnams so //
translated: All sentient beings means those who seek objects such as Dharma and so forth.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid kyis ni 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid kyis ni 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis so //
translated: By its nature means by the nature of luminosity.

original: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not the intended meaning.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab ste /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab ste /
translated: Thus, having supplicated the BhagavƒÅn,

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyis de nyid du mchod pa bstan pa'i phyir mchod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyis de nyid du mchod pa bstan pa'i phyir mchod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to demonstrate the worship in that very reality for those abiding in the perfection stage, he declares worship, etc.

original: dus gsum du bzhugs pa zhes pa ni dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po gsungs so //
analyzed: dus gsum du bzhugs pa zhes pa ni dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po gsungs so //
translated: The abiding in the three times is declared to be Great Vajradhara, because of being the very nature of the Tathagatas abiding in the three times.

original: de dang 'brel pa ni khams gsum pa'i zhes pa sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten ni rang gi sku la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir khams gsum par gsungs so //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa ni khams gsum pa'i zhes pa sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten ni rang gi sku la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir khams gsum par gsungs so //
translated: The connection with that is the three realms, because of being the very essence of the world of sentient beings and the world of the vessel.

original: rang gi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: The own body, etc.

original: rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
translated: is the form of the Victor Vairochana, etc.

original: 'dir sma'i sgra phyis pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir sma'i sgra phyis pa ste /
translated: Here the word etc. is added.

original: bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa la 'di'i mchod pa bstan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa la 'di'i mchod pa bstan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the worship of this is demonstrated in the manifest Bhagavat himself.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the implied meaning.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya'i gzugs dang lang tsho dang skal pa bzang po la sogs pa dang ldan pa thams cad kyi 'dod par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya'i gzugs dang lang tsho dang skal pa bzang po la sogs pa dang ldan pa thams cad kyi 'dod par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Since she is the object of desire of all those endowed with the form, youth, and good fortune of Great Vajradhara, pleasing and so forth are mentioned.

original: bden pa gnyis ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The two truths are the nature of the relative and the ultimate.

original: de'i bdag nyid can ni de ring gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid can ni de ring gi ngo bo'o //
translated: The nature of that is the nature of today.

original: thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i yul yin pa nyid kyi phyir de spangs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i yul yin pa nyid kyi phyir de spangs pa'o //
translated: Since she is the object of complete knowledge, she is abandoned.

original: mig re re'ang bden @102b pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mig re re'ang bden @102b pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Each eye has the nature of the two truths. This is the meaning.

original: lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can ni me long la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams re re'ang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku la de'i bdag nyid las so zhes shes
analyzed: lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can ni me long la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams re re'ang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku la de'i bdag nyid las so zhes shes
translated: The twenty-five deities are the five tathagatas, who are the nature of the five wisdoms such as the mirror-like wisdom, and each of the five tathagatas is the nature of the five tathagatas.

original: par byed do //
analyzed: par byed do //
translated: It is the great seal.

original: khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo spyan ma la sogs pa rnams me long la sogs pa'i ye shes nyid ro mnyam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de rnams 'dir so sor ma bgrangs pa nyid do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo spyan ma la sogs pa rnams me long la sogs pa'i ye shes nyid ro mnyam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de rnams 'dir so sor ma bgrangs pa nyid do zhes pa'o //
translated: The intrinsic natures of the constituents, media, etc., are Locana, etc., because they are of the same taste as the mirror-like intuition, etc. Therefore, they are not enumerated separately here.

original: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The great seal is the nature of the consecration of oneself.

original: brtag par bya ba ni rtag tu de yid la bya'o //
analyzed: brtag par bya ba ni rtag tu de yid la bya'o //
translated: One should always keep it in mind as the object of contemplation.

original: sems can rnams kyi'ang rgyud la bskyed par bya'o //üîΩ'di nyid bla na med pa'i mchod pa /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi'ang rgyud la bskyed par bya'o // 'di nyid bla na med pa'i mchod pa /
translated: One should generate it in the stream of consciousness of all sentient beings.

original: dus gsum pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: dus gsum pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'o //
translated: This is the unexcelled worship of all the Buddhas of the three times.

original: bsod nams ma lus pa nye bar bsags pa la sogs pa 'khor ba spangs pa dang sdig pa zad pa dag gi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsod nams ma lus pa nye bar bsags pa la sogs pa 'khor ba spangs pa dang sdig pa zad pa dag gi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the cause of the accumulation of all merit, etc., and of the abandonment of cyclic life and the exhaustion of evil.

original: byol sor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni logs na zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i shar la sogs pa'i logs na bzhugs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: byol sor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni logs na zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i shar la sogs pa'i logs na bzhugs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The ‚Äúsides‚Äù and so forth are the east and so forth of the mandala lord, because they are situated on the sides of the mandala.

original: gzhan zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i sku ste de'i gnas su bya bas dang / de la sgrar bya bas dang / de bsre bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i sku ste de'i gnas su bya bas dang / de la sgrar bya bas dang / de bsre bar bya'o //
translated: ‚Äú Other‚Äù refers to the bodies of the mandala deities, Vairochana and so forth, and they are to be placed in that location, and they are to be made into sound, and they are to be mixed.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra bar ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra bar ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: ‚Äú Like Great Vajradhara‚Äù means like Great Vajradhara.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gzugs kyi dmigs par bya ba de bzhin nyid du 'dod pa'i dbang las logs na bzhugs pa de dag kyang dmigs par bya'o //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gzugs kyi dmigs par bya ba de bzhin nyid du 'dod pa'i dbang las logs na bzhugs pa de dag kyang dmigs par bya'o //
translated: Those who are situated on the sides, who are the objects of observation of the form of the enjoyment body, are also to be observed, because of the power of the desire for suchness.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnam 'phrul yin pa'i phyir zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnam 'phrul yin pa'i phyir zhes pa ni /
translated: ‚Äú Because they are emanations of Great Vajradhara‚Äù means

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes mngon par dgongs so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes mngon par dgongs so //
translated: that it is the thought that Great Vajradhara himself is situated in the form of Vairochana and so forth.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
translated: The explanation by the intention.

original: gtsang zhing zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi yan lag tu gsungs pa'i sa sbyong ba'i rim pas yongs su dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtsang zhing zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi yan lag tu gsungs pa'i sa sbyong ba'i rim pas yongs su dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Pure means that it is completely pure because of the process of purifying the ground that is taught as a branch of the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: gang yang sa sbyang bar mi nus pa de'i tshe la lag pas reg nas sngags bzlas par bya ste bsgoms pas yongs su dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang yang sa sbyang bar mi nus pa de'i tshe la lag pas reg nas sngags bzlas par bya ste bsgoms pas yongs su dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If one is unable to purify the ground, then having touched it with one‚Äôs hand, one should recite the mantra, since it is completely pure through meditation.

original: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa legs par 'dus byas pa 'am sa'i phyogs ni @103a * //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa legs par 'dus byas pa 'am sa'i phyogs ni @103a * //
translated: A temple, etc., is well constructed, or the place of the ground

original: mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: is supreme.

original: sa'i cha ni chu rlung dang / gling dang / ri bong yang ngo //
analyzed: sa'i cha ni chu rlung dang / gling dang / ri bong yang ngo //
translated: The part of the ground is also water, wind, an island, and a mountain.

original: rgyal nyid skyes zhes pa ni rgyal ba'i bdag nyid la skyes pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rgyal ba la dmigs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rgyal nyid skyes te /
analyzed: rgyal nyid skyes zhes pa ni rgyal ba'i bdag nyid la skyes pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rgyal ba la dmigs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rgyal nyid skyes te /
translated: Born from the nature of the Victor means that because it is born from the nature of the Victor, and because it is the focus of the Victor, it is born from the nature of the Victor.

original: rdo rje theg pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la brdar btags pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la brdar btags pa ste /
translated: It is a designation for a bodhisattva who is abiding in the Vajra Vehicle.

original: skye bo dam pa gang yin pa la'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: skye bo dam pa gang yin pa la'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: To the best of persons means to the best of beings.

original: rab tu dang ba dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu dang ba dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: Faith and equality.

original: ba'i lci ba ni srog chags med pa'i ba'i lci ba'o //
analyzed: ba'i lci ba ni srog chags med pa'i ba'i lci ba'o //
translated: Cow dung is the dung of cows that are not killed.

original: dri ni tsandan la sogs pa'i dri'i rdzas kyi shun pa phye mar sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: dri ni tsandan la sogs pa'i dri'i rdzas kyi shun pa phye mar sbyar ba'o //
translated: Scent is the powder of the outer skin of substances such as sandalwood.

original: sogs pa'i sgras gur kum la sogs pa gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras gur kum la sogs pa gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The word etc. should be taken to include saffron and so on.

original: sa phyogs su ni mthil mnyam par legs par brdung zhing skra la sogs pa bsal bar ro //
analyzed: sa phyogs su ni mthil mnyam par legs par brdung zhing skra la sogs pa bsal bar ro //

translated: If one wishes to emanate and gather, then, as it is said, if the steadfast one does not wish to emanate the mind and so forth, then one should bind the mind to that very [vajra-holder].üîΩThe peaceful vajra-holder is as previously stated.

analyzed: dbang chen la sogs pa ni dal ba la sogs pa dang / sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi po la sbyar bar bya ba ste /
translated: The great elements, etc. , are to be applied to the four ma·πá·∏çalas of the moon, etc. ,

analyzed: bsgom par bya'o //

original: bdag nyid smod pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid smod pa'o //

analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad gzugs kyi phung po yin pa bzhin du mchod par bya ba nyid kyi phyir mchod rten dang 'dra ba'o //

original: le'u bzhi par gsungs pa'i don de nas bshad bgyi ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid de'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: padma r'a ga la sogs pa zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgra las aindra n'i la dang / shel dang gser dang / ma ra ka ta la sogs pa bsdus so // dar dang bal la sogs pa zhes pa ni 'dab ma las @106a * //
translated: The words ‚Äúsuch as ruby‚Äù include sapphire, crystal, gold, emerald, and so on.üîΩ‚ÄúSilk, cotton, and so on‚Äù means

original: byung zhing skyes pa ni dar la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: byung zhing skyes pa ni dar la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: bal ni lug la sogs pa'i spu la sogs pa las byas pa yin pa'i phyir dar dang bal la sogs pa zhes brjod par bya'o //

original: mig gi dbang po'i yul bstan nas //
analyzed: mig gi dbang po'i yul bstan nas //

analyzed: sogs pa'i sgra las reg pa'i dbang po gzhan rnams gsungs pa rna ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

original: rnyog ma ni rtsod pa'i dus su nye bar bsags pa'i sgrib pa ni rnyog ma'i dri ma'o //
analyzed: rnyog ma ni rtsod pa'i dus su nye bar bsags pa'i sgrib pa ni rnyog ma'i dri ma'o //

analyzed: de 'khrud par byed pa ni sel bar byed pas so //

original: mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa ni zung 'jug bshad do //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa ni zung 'jug bshad do //

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid can yin pa nyid kyi phyir bla ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid can yin pa nyid kyi phyir bla ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //

original: 'bras bu tha mal pa ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu tha mal pa ni /

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i 'bras bu 'grub pa dang / phra mo'i dngos grub la sogs pa grub pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i 'bras bu 'grub pa dang / phra mo'i dngos grub la sogs pa grub pa'o //

original: sangs rgyas nyid ni yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid ni yongs su dag pa'o //

original: 'di nyid la zhes sprel bar bstan pa'i don du gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di nyid la zhes sprel bar bstan pa'i don du gsungs so //

original: 'bras bu don du gnyer bas ni sbyin pa la 'jug go zhes pas 'bras bu dang por bshad nas de'i rgyu sbyin pa 'grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'bras bu don du gnyer bas ni sbyin pa la 'jug go zhes pas 'bras bu dang por bshad nas de'i rgyu sbyin pa 'grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Since one who strives for the result engages in generosity, after explaining the result first, it is said, In order to accomplish the cause of that, generosity, and so on.

original: mthar thug pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mthar thug pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Possessing the ultimate gnosis means

original: ngal bas sangs rgyas pa la gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so sor rtog pa'i gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro @106b zhes mngon par dgongs pas mthar thug pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhes mngon par brjod do //
analyzed: ngal bas sangs rgyas pa la gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so sor rtog pa'i gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro @106b zhes mngon par dgongs pas mthar thug pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhes mngon par brjod do //

original: thun mong gi cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: thun mong gi cho ga gsungs pa /

original: bsam gtan gyis kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

original: bdag po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'bras bu'i dbang las bdag po rnams dmigs pa la'o //
analyzed: bdag po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'bras bu'i dbang las bdag po rnams dmigs pa la'o //

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang lha thams cad la dmigs pa la thams cad dbul ba ma yin no zhes ston par byed do //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang lha thams cad la dmigs pa la thams cad dbul ba ma yin no zhes ston par byed do //

original: de bzhin shes pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su zhes pa ni tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de bzhin shes pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su zhes pa ni tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te /

analyzed: gang gi zhes pa ni tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa rnams dang / dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi sku la gnas pa rnams so //

original: nyon mongs pa zhes pa ni /

analyzed: de rnam par dag pa'i ni 'od gsal lo //

original: de mngon du byed pa'i thabs nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de mngon du byed pa'i thabs nyid yin pa'i phyir /

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa drug klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar gsungs pa la /

original: gang yang 'dir ni ngag dag pa //

original: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo de nyid 'dir gsungs so zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo de nyid 'dir gsungs so zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that this very wheel of deities such as LocanƒÅ is being taught here.

original: gsungs pa 'di'i dgongs pa 'di yin te spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyi rdzas 'gugs pa de nyid bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa 'di'i dgongs pa 'di yin te spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyi rdzas 'gugs pa de nyid bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The intended meaning of this statement is that one should perform that very summoning of the substances of LocanƒÅ and so forth.

original: de bzhin du yang ji ltar 'byung bar sbyar bar bya'o//
analyzed: de bzhin du yang ji ltar 'byung bar sbyar bar bya'o//
translated: And likewise, one should apply it as it occurs.

original: de nyid ces pa ni drug pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ces pa ni drug pa nyid do //
translated: That very is the sixth case.

original: rang gi rang bzhin bsgyur bas zhes pa ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa rnams rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de'i phyir de dag bsgyur bas rnam shes las de'i rnam pa 'dzin pa nyid kyi phyir rnam shes me long lta bu de'i nang
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin bsgyur bas zhes pa ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa rnams rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de'i phyir de dag bsgyur bas rnam shes las de'i rnam pa 'dzin pa nyid kyi phyir rnam shes me long lta bu de'i nang
translated: By transforming one's own nature, it is said that one should cause them to be attached to that. Because form, sound, and so forth are of the nature of Great Vajradhara, therefore by transforming them, one should cause them to be attached to that within mirror-like consciousness, because consciousness takes on the aspect of that.

original: du gzugs brnyan lta bu la de dag mngon par zhen pa'i phyir chags par byed do zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: du gzugs brnyan lta bu la de dag mngon par zhen pa'i phyir chags par byed do zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Within that mirror-like consciousness, one should cause them to be attached to that, like a reflection.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i chags pa'i rgyu la 'bras bu nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i chags pa'i rgyu la 'bras bu nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cause of attachment to form and so forth is figuratively designated as the effect.

original: de bas na zhes pa ni 'dod chags nyams su myong ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de bas na zhes pa ni 'dod chags nyams su myong ba nyid kyis so //
translated: Therefore, means by the experience of passion itself.

original: thar pa 'dod pa rnams la yin gyi gzhan rnams la ma yin no //
analyzed: thar pa 'dod pa rnams la yin gyi gzhan rnams la ma yin no //
translated: It is for those who desire liberation, not for others.

original: dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes pa ni dam tshig 'dod chags te /
analyzed: dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes pa ni dam tshig 'dod chags te /
translated: The wheel of commitment is the commitment of passion.

original: dam tshig de rdzogs par byed pa ni 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: dam tshig de rdzogs par byed pa ni 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel is that which perfects that commitment.

original: 'od dpag med gtso bor gyur pas dkyil 'khor la'o //
analyzed: 'od dpag med gtso bor gyur pas dkyil 'khor la'o //
translated: The mandala is that which is headed by Amitabha.

original: bud med dang skyes pa lta bu rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gnas yongs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bud med dang skyes pa lta bu rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gnas yongs su gyur pa'o //
translated: The transformations of the bases are the male and female, which will be explained.

original: skyes pa rnams zhes bshad par bya ba ma yin /
analyzed: skyes pa rnams zhes bshad par bya ba ma yin /
translated: It is not to be explained that the males are not transformed.

original: bud med kyi gzugs kyis yongs su gyur par 'dod pa nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bud med kyi gzugs kyis yongs su gyur par 'dod pa nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not that the transformation is desired in the form of a female.

original: bud med rnams kyang khyad par du yongs su gyur par byed kyi dang po nas yongs su gyur par 'dod pa bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bud med rnams kyang khyad par du yongs su gyur par byed kyi dang po nas yongs su gyur par 'dod pa bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is because the females are also transformed in a special way, not as desired from the beginning.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gzhi zhes pa la sogs ba @108b gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gzhi zhes pa la sogs ba @108b gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, he declares the basis, etc.

original: rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang shin tu rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang shin tu rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po'o //
translated: Yoga, subsequent yoga, great yoga, and supreme yoga.

original: stong pa nyid la zhugs nas langs te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la zhugs nas langs te /
translated: Having entered emptiness, one arises.

original: rigs lnga dgod par byas nas byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: rigs lnga dgod par byas nas byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: Having arranged the five clans, one blesses.

original: rdo rje dang padma 'dus bya ba yang byas nas /
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma 'dus bya ba yang byas nas /
translated: Having also performed the union of the vajra and lotus,

original: de ltar sgom pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar sgom pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: what is that meditation?

original: dbang po gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dbang po gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúthe two organs,‚Äù and so on.

original: lha sum cu po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can bud med la sna tshogs pa'i dga' ba'i bya ba byed cing bud med sna tshogs la rol pas mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lha sum cu po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can bud med la sna tshogs pa'i dga' ba'i bya ba byed cing bud med sna tshogs la rol pas mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa'i phyir /
translated: One should perform the various joys with a woman who is the nature of all thirty deities, and by enjoying various women, one should visualize the equality of all.

original: de'ang skad cig gcig tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'ang skad cig gcig tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, because it is only for an instant,

original: skad cig gcig nye bar longs spyod par bya'o zhes brjod do //
analyzed: skad cig gcig nye bar longs spyod par bya'o zhes brjod do //
translated: it is said, ‚Äúone should enjoy for an instant.‚Äù

original: sgrub pa po thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi rigs can rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa po thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi rigs can rnams kyi'o //
translated: This is for all practitioners who are of the type of desire.

original: sprul pa'i sku la dmigs nas yul nyams su myong ba'i dus su longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus chos kyi sku la dmigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku la dmigs nas yul nyams su myong ba'i dus su longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus chos kyi sku la dmigs pa'i phyir /
translated: With respect to the nirmƒÅ·πáakƒÅya, when the object is experienced, the sambhogakƒÅya is called the dharma[kƒÅya] because it is the object of observation of the dharmakƒÅya.

original: de'i 'og tu yang ldang ba'i phyir chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu yang ldang ba'i phyir chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Because it arises after that, it is called the dharma[kƒÅya] and the sambhogakƒÅya.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: For that very reason, it is called the stage of generation, and so on.

original: de nyid ni drug pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ni drug pa nyid do //
translated: That is the sixth.

original: de nyid du gnas par zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid du gnas par zhes pa ni /

original: sgyu ma lta bu la gnas pa sgyu ma lta bu rnams zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu la gnas pa sgyu ma lta bu rnams zhes pa'i don to //

analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi zhes pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o //

original: de bzhin du rgyal ba thams cad kyi gnas zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyal ba thams cad kyi gnas zhes pa ni /
translated: Similarly, with respect to the abode of all victors,

original: 'chad par byed pa rgyal ba rnams //
analyzed: 'chad par byed pa rgyal ba rnams //
translated: it is said, the victors who explain.üîΩWith respect to the stage of completion,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, the stage of completion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni lang kar gshegs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni lang kar gshegs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags te /

original: de yang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnam par dag pa gdod nas dag pa nyid rjes su sngags so //
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnam par dag pa gdod nas dag pa nyid rjes su sngags so //

original: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'chang ba /
analyzed: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'chang ba /

original: thams cad kyi lus kyi nang du son pa /
analyzed: thams cad kyi lus kyi nang du son pa /

original: rin po che rin thang chen po /
analyzed: rin po che rin thang chen po /

original: gos dri ma can gyis yongs su dkris pa ltar phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi gos kyis yongs su dkris pa /
analyzed: gos dri ma can gyis yongs su dkris pa ltar phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi gos kyis yongs su dkris pa /

analyzed: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gis zil gyis non pa /

original: yongs su rtog pa'i dri mas dri ma can du gyur pa /

original: rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug par gsungs na /
analyzed: rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug par gsungs na /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ci ltar mu stegs byed pa bdag tu smra ba dang / 'di ci ltar smra ba ma @109a * //

original: lags / bcom ldan 'das mu stegs byed rnams kyang /
analyzed: lags / bcom ldan 'das mu stegs byed rnams kyang /
translated: BhagavƒÅn, the tƒ´rthikas also teach a self

original: rtag par byed pa po /
analyzed: rtag par byed pa po /
translated: that is permanent,

original: yon tan med pa /
analyzed: yon tan med pa /
translated: without qualities,

original: khyab bdag mi 'jigs pa'o zhes bdag tu smra ba ston par bgyid do //
analyzed: khyab bdag mi 'jigs pa'o zhes bdag tu smra ba ston par bgyid do //
translated: the all-pervading lord, and fearless.‚Äù

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn replied:

original: blo gros chen po nga'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa ni mu stegs byed kyi bdag tu smra ba dang mtshungs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: blo gros chen po nga'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa ni mu stegs byed kyi bdag tu smra ba dang mtshungs pa ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúMahƒÅmati, my teaching of the tathƒÅgatagarbha is not the same as the tƒ´rthikas‚Äô teaching of a self.

original: 'on kyang stongs pa nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sogs pa'i tshig gi don rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nye bar bstan par byas nas byis pa rnams bdag med pas 'jigs pa'i gnas yongs su spang ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ston par byed do zhes pas sems
analyzed: 'on kyang stongs pa nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sogs pa'i tshig gi don rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nye bar bstan par byas nas byis pa rnams bdag med pas 'jigs pa'i gnas yongs su spang ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ston par byed do zhes pas sems
translated: However, having taught the meaning of the words such as emptiness, reality limit, nirvƒÅ·πáa, non-production, signlessness, and wishlessness as the essence of the TathƒÅgata, the TathƒÅgatas teach in order to completely abandon the childish fear of selflessness.

original: can rgyal ba'i gnas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
analyzed: can rgyal ba'i gnas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes so //

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas thams cad kyi sgra ni nye bar ldan pa ma yin pa'i las rnams la 'jug pa nyid du bshad do //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas thams cad kyi sgra ni nye bar ldan pa ma yin pa'i las rnams la 'jug pa nyid du bshad do //

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: chos thams cad ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //

original: tshig brdzun du smra bas gdul ba rnams 'gugs pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: tshig brdzun du smra bas gdul ba rnams 'gugs pa'i don du'o //
translated: For the sake of attracting those to be trained who are to be disciplined by false speech.

analyzed: bsgom mo zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma'i don du gsungs pa rnams kun nas kun du rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa zhes pa ni bden pa gnyis la 'jug par ro //

original: brdzun du smra ba ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid du bshad pa'o //
analyzed: brdzun du smra ba ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid du bshad pa'o //

original: de nyid ces pa ni drug pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces pa ni drug pa'o //

analyzed: de rdo rje gsum gyi dngos po nyid tha dad ma yin pa yang so so so sor bya ba dang tha snyad btags pa zhes pa ni dbye ba'o //

original: gang yin pa zhes pa drug pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po mnyes par bya zhes pa ni /

original: drang ba'i don to //
