original: mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po lnga po'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po lnga po'o //
translated: The vajra of unshakable intuition is the five aggregates of consciousness.

original: de tsam nyid kyi phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams de las skyes pa ni rdo rje chos kyi sku de las skyes pa'i zung 'jug gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de tsam nyid kyi phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams de las skyes pa ni rdo rje chos kyi sku de las skyes pa'i zung 'jug gi ngo bo'o //
translated: Because of just that, the aggregates of form, etc. are born from it, and the vajra body of reality is born from it, the nature of union.

original: gsungs pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: gsungs pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur //
translated: One attains the very meaning of what is said.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: mi bskyod pa'i dam tshig bshad nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i dam tshig bshad nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: Having explained the commitment of Akshobhya, in order to explain the commitments of Vairochana, etc.,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúThen, Vajrapani, etc.

original: phyag na rdo rje ni bod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje ni bod par byed pa'o //
translated: Vajrapani is the one who makes the request.

original: ye shes thar pa rab bsgrub pa ni ye shes ni dzny'a na ste /
analyzed: ye shes thar pa rab bsgrub pa ni ye shes ni dzny'a na ste /
translated: The accomplishment of the liberation of intuition is intuition, jnana,

original: dzny'a rtogs pa la'o //
analyzed: dzny'a rtogs pa la'o //
translated: because jna means to understand.

original: na dgag pa la'o //
analyzed: na dgag pa la'o //
translated: Na is a negative.

original: des na 'di don shes pa'i dngos po med cing mi shes pa med pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal lo //
analyzed: des na 'di don shes pa'i dngos po med cing mi shes pa med pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal lo //
translated: Therefore, this means that the nature of the object of knowledge is neither existent nor nonexistent, and is naturally radiant.

original: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag las grol ba'i phyir yongs su dag pa'i ye shes kyi sku ni thar pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag las grol ba'i phyir yongs su dag pa'i ye shes kyi sku ni thar pa'o //
translated: The body of gnosis that is pure because it is liberated from cyclic existence and nirvana is liberation.

original: de mchog tu gyur pas sgrub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de mchog tu gyur pas sgrub par byed pa ste /
translated: It is the supreme accomplishment,

original: sgrub par byed pa gzhan ni thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa gzhan ni thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because other accomplishments are common.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po ni khyad par du rang bzhin ta chos rnams thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po ni khyad par du rang bzhin ta chos rnams thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Great Vajradhara is the special nature, the nature of all phenomena.

original: des dag pa ni sdig pa dang bsod nams dag gis kun du 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ma gos pa'o //
analyzed: des dag pa ni sdig pa dang bsod nams dag gis kun du 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ma gos pa'o //
translated: It is pure because it is unstained by the mixture of sin and merit.

original: byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid do //
analyzed: byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid do //
translated: Enlightenment is Great Vajradhara.

original: de'i don du spyod pa ni mchog tu gyur pas ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don du spyod pa ni mchog tu gyur pas ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The conduct for that purpose is the supreme teaching.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Perfect complete enlightenment is Great Vajradhara.

original: dam tshig gi de kho na nyid gang yin pas de bsgrub par bya ba de ni sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi de kho na nyid gang yin pas de bsgrub par bya ba de ni sgrub pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment of that by means of the reality of the commitments is the practice.

original: chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa dam tshig gi de kho na nyid 'chad par byed do //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa dam tshig gi de kho na nyid 'chad par byed do //
translated: The reality of the commitments is explained by ‚Äúthe Dharma, etc.‚Äù

original: rin chen chos ni chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: rin chen chos ni chos kyi sku'o //
translated: The jewel Dharma is the Dharma body.

original: rdo rje rab tu 'jug pas ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rab tu 'jug pas ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
translated: The vajra is the emanation body, because it enters into the vajra.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni ye shes kyi @110b sku'o ;
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni ye shes kyi @110b sku'o ;
translated: Vajrasattva is the gnosis body.

original: / rnam par smin pa las byung ba ni rnam par smin pa'i phyir dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ni rnam par smin pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: / rnam par smin pa las byung ba ni rnam par smin pa'i phyir dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ni rnam par smin pa las byung ba'o //
translated: The body, etc., of the emanation body, which is arisen from the evolution of karma, is the body, etc., arisen from evolution, because it is born from the evolution of karma.

original: sprul pa'i sku'i gnas skabs kyi phung po la sogs pa de rnams 'phrogs pa ni gsal ba'o //
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku'i gnas skabs kyi phung po la sogs pa de rnams 'phrogs pa ni gsal ba'o //
translated: The manifestation of those is the manifestation of the body, etc., of the emanation body.

original: des zhes pa ni chos kyi skus so //
analyzed: des zhes pa ni chos kyi skus so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that‚Äù means by the Dharma body.

original: rnam kun du zhes pa ni ma lus par ro //
analyzed: rnam kun du zhes pa ni ma lus par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIn every way‚Äù means completely.

original: de lta bur gyur pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that like?

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúall, etc.‚Äù

original: sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa ni ye shes kyi sku rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa ni ye shes kyi sku rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: The complete attainment of the enlightenment of the buddhas is the complete attainment of the gnosis body.

original: yid bzhin nor bu lta bur ni /
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu lta bur ni /
translated: Like a wish-fulfilling gem,

original: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par nus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par nus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: He is equal to him because he is able to fulfill all wishes.

original: nor gyi rgya mtsho yongs su gang ni yo byad la dbang thob pa'o //
analyzed: nor gyi rgya mtsho yongs su gang ni yo byad la dbang thob pa'o //
translated: The ocean of wealth is filled with the attainment of mastery over requisites.

original: thams cad nyid kyis ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs can rnams kyis so //
analyzed: thams cad nyid kyis ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs can rnams kyis so //
translated: By all means, those who belong to the family of Vairocana.

original: 'di'i bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'i bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is his function?

original: gti mug ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gti mug ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: He declares, ‚ÄúDelusion,‚Äù etc.

original: 'dod chags kyi dam tshig gi dbang du byas nas sgyu ma zhes byas pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi dam tshig gi dbang du byas nas sgyu ma zhes byas pas gsungs pa /
translated: With regard to the pledge of passion, he declares, ‚ÄúIllusion,‚Äù etc.

original: der ni zhes pa sgyu ma'i sku la'o //
analyzed: der ni zhes pa sgyu ma'i sku la'o //
translated: There, in the illusory body.

original: phung po la sogs gang bar bya ba ni shin tu rnal 'byor gyi rim par sprul pa'i sku 'dzin par byed pa de'i ngo bo nyid du bya'o //
analyzed: phung po la sogs gang bar bya ba ni shin tu rnal 'byor gyi rim par sprul pa'i sku 'dzin par byed pa de'i ngo bo nyid du bya'o //
translated: The aggregates, etc., are to be filled, that is, one should make them the very essence of the enjoyment body, in the process of the very deep yoga.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He declares, ‚ÄúThe four,‚Äù etc.

original: byang chub kyi ni tshul mchog ni rin po che'i gang zag go //
analyzed: byang chub kyi ni tshul mchog ni rin po che'i gang zag go //
translated: The supreme method of enlightenment is the precious person.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: kun rdzob ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te dbang po las dam pa'i bde ba'i spyod pa las zung 'jug ces pa la sogs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: kun rdzob ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te dbang po las dam pa'i bde ba'i spyod pa las zung 'jug ces pa la sogs par sbyar ro //
translated: The verse beginning with ‚Äúrelative‚Äù is applied to ‚Äúunion‚Äù and so forth, from the conduct of supreme bliss from the sense organs.

original: de'i spyod pa ni bden pa gnyis sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: de'i spyod pa ni bden pa gnyis sbyor ba ste /
translated: Its conduct is the union of the two truths.

original: de la mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yi ni de dag so sor rtogs pa'i don du mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba ste des so //
analyzed: de la mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yi ni de dag so sor rtogs pa'i don du mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba ste des so //
translated: There, the application of equipoise is for the purpose of realizing them individually.

original: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis su med par nyams su myong ba'i di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ste thams cad rtogs par nams kyi'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis su med par nyams su myong ba'i di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ste thams cad rtogs par nams kyi'o //
translated: This, which is experienced nondually, is of all buddhas, of all realizations.

original: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog ni /
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog ni /
translated: The supreme method of great passion

original: don chen po skyed par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don chen po skyed par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is so called because it generates the great meaning.

original: de nas zhes bya ba sogs pa la 'gro ba'i rnam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sna tshogs so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba sogs pa la 'gro ba'i rnam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sna tshogs so //
translated: Then, the verse beginning with ‚Äúvarious‚Äù is so called because it is the aspect of migrating beings.

original: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje gcig tu gyur ba'i phyir rdo rje mi phyed gsum mo //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje gcig tu gyur ba'i phyir rdo rje mi phyed gsum mo //
translated: The vajra of the indivisible three is the vajra of the body and so on, which become one.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can nyid yin pa'i phyir rgyal ba'i bdag nyid do //üîΩrdo rje 'chang gi dngos @111a * //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can nyid yin pa'i phyir rgyal ba'i bdag nyid do // rdo rje 'chang gi dngos @111a * //
translated: He is the nature of the Victor, because he is the nature of the five Tathagatas, Vairocana, etc.

original: grub ni rdo rje'i dngos grub po //üîΩde'i thabs nye bar ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: grub ni rdo rje'i dngos grub po // de'i thabs nye bar ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The Vajra-siddhi is the Vajra-accomplishment.

original: rab ston pas so //
analyzed: rab ston pas so //
translated: He is the teacher of that, because he is the one who teaches the means of that.üîΩHe is the teacher, because he is the one who teaches.

original: rtsub ngag sogs zhes pa'i sgra las brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa rnams gzhan du dam tshig lnga nye bar song nas bzhi po rnams kyang bshad do zhes pa ni 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtsub ngag sogs zhes pa'i sgra las brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa rnams gzhan du dam tshig lnga nye bar song nas bzhi po rnams kyang bshad do zhes pa ni 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The words ‚Äúharsh speech, etc.‚Äù imply the other four pledges, lying, etc., and thus the four are explained.

original: phung po la sogs med ston tshig ni /
analyzed: phung po la sogs med ston tshig ni /
translated: The words ‚Äúthe non-existence of the aggregates, etc.‚Äù

original: 'dir sogs kyi sgra las khams la sogs pa bsdus so //
analyzed: 'dir sogs kyi sgra las khams la sogs pa bsdus so //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the elements, etc.

original: de'i don ni phung po la sogs med pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i don ni phung po la sogs med pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of that is the non-existence of the aggregates, etc.

original: phung po la sogs pa dngos po med pa'i don la ma bslabs par dngos po med par brjod pa yang /
analyzed: phung po la sogs pa dngos po med pa'i don la ma bslabs par dngos po med par brjod pa yang /
translated: Without having trained in the meaning of the non-existence of the aggregates, etc., one should not even utter the word ‚Äúnon-existence.‚Äù

original: rang gi don dang gzhan gyi don ci'ang sgrub par mi nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi don dang gzhan gyi don ci'ang sgrub par mi nus pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not that one is unable to accomplish any of one's own or others' goals.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: de lta bu de bslabs pas shes so //
analyzed: de lta bu de bslabs pas shes so //
translated: That one is known through training in that way.

original: tshig dang ldan zhes pa ni drug pa'i rjes su'o //
analyzed: tshig dang ldan zhes pa ni drug pa'i rjes su'o //
translated: Endowed with the words is after the sixth.

original: ngo bo gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: ngo bo gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the essence?

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin phung po la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin phung po la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The aggregates, etc. , which have the nature of all the Tathagatas, Vairocana, etc.

original: de rnams kyi bdag po ni de rnams skye ba dang zad pa dag gi rgyur gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bdag po ni de rnams skye ba dang zad pa dag gi rgyur gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Their lord is just the cause of their arising and cessation.

original: khams gsum pa zhes pa ni 'dir khams zhes pa 'di 'chad par byed pa 'di gsungs pa /
analyzed: khams gsum pa zhes pa ni 'dir khams zhes pa 'di 'chad par byed pa 'di gsungs pa /
translated: Of the three realms - here, this is said to explain the word realm:

original: rang gi mtshan nyid zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: One's own characteristics, etc.

original: slar yang khams kyi don ci zhe na /
analyzed: slar yang khams kyi don ci zhe na /
translated: Again, what is the meaning of realm?

original: rab tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rab tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thorough differentiation, etc. is said.

original: khams gsum pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di'i don de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di'i don de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The meaning of the three realms and so forth is stated by that and so forth.

original: bshad pa gnyis ka phan tshun sbrel bar gsungs pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa gnyis ka phan tshun sbrel bar gsungs pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The explanation of both is stated as mutually connected by that and so forth.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa gsum du gsungs pas lhan cig sbyor bar byed pa de nyid kyis na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa gsum du gsungs pas lhan cig sbyor bar byed pa de nyid kyis na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Since the world systems are stated as threefold, it is connected by just that and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa 'di slar yang ci zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa 'di slar yang ci zhe na /
translated: Again, what is the Tathagata's conduct?

original: 'di nyid la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is stated by just this and so forth.

original: spyod pa nyid kyi bsngags pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: spyod pa nyid kyi bsngags pa zhes pa ni /
translated: The praise of conduct itself is

original: drang ba'i don dang dgongs pas bshad pa dag go //
analyzed: drang ba'i don dang dgongs pas bshad pa dag go //
translated: the provisional meaning and the explanation of the intention.

original: rgyal chen ris bzhi la sogs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i sogs kyi sgra las mtshe ma la sogs pa lnga rnams bsdus so //
analyzed: rgyal chen ris bzhi la sogs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i sogs kyi sgra las mtshe ma la sogs pa lnga rnams bsdus so //
translated: The four great kings and so forth, the word and so forth includes the five such as YƒÅma.

original: zin pa'i phung po la sogs pa bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par dbye ba'i bar ma chad par ma zin pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: zin pa'i phung po la sogs pa bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par dbye ba'i bar ma chad par ma zin pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: The aggregates, etc. that are grasped are taught in terms of what is not grasped, without interruption, in the division of the two truths.

original: de rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Those and so forth.

original: gang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig las @111b gzugs med pa'i khams na gzugs med do //
analyzed: gang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig las @111b gzugs med pa'i khams na gzugs med do //
translated: The words where and so forth indicate that there is no form in the formless realm.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di dag gi don la med ces mi ldan pa'i don du bshad do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di dag gi don la med ces mi ldan pa'i don du bshad do //
translated: For that very reason, in their meaning is explained as the meaning of not possessing.

original: steng mngon par brjod pa'i dbang du byas nas bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /üîΩthog mar yang thun mong du bstan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: steng mngon par brjod pa'i dbang du byas nas bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / thog mar yang thun mong du bstan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: In terms of the upper expression, four and so forth are stated.

original: rgyu ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rgyu ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Because it is taught as common at the beginning, too, moving and so forth are stated.

original: phung po la sogs pa rnams so zhes pa ni zin pa dang ma zin pa'o //
analyzed: phung po la sogs pa rnams so zhes pa ni zin pa dang ma zin pa'o //
translated: The aggregates, etc. are grasped and not grasped.

original: rang las zhes pa ni rang dbang las so //
analyzed: rang las zhes pa ni rang dbang las so //
translated: From oneself is from one's own power.

original: brjod gyis mi lang ba'i yang zhes bya ba ni le'u dang por bshad zin to //
analyzed: brjod gyis mi lang ba'i yang zhes bya ba ni le'u dang por bshad zin to //
translated: The words inexpressible and so forth have already been explained in the first chapter.

original: dam tshig la the tshom za ba'i sgo nas ni sngar gsungs pa'i dam tshig lnga po de shes pa la the tshom za ba ste 'phags pa ma yin pa'i las rab tu 'jug pa de'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: dam tshig la the tshom za ba'i sgo nas ni sngar gsungs pa'i dam tshig lnga po de shes pa la the tshom za ba ste 'phags pa ma yin pa'i las rab tu 'jug pa de'i sgo nas so //
translated: By way of doubt about the commitments, he is doubtful about understanding the five commitments mentioned above, and by way of engaging in the activity of a non-noble being.

original: thun mong ni mchog ma yin pa brtags pa'i sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: thun mong ni mchog ma yin pa brtags pa'i sgrub thabs so //
translated: The common is the means of accomplishment of the inferior imagined.

original: mchog ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: mchog ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub thabs so //
translated: The supreme is the means of accomplishment of the stage of completion.

original: rang gi lha ni rang gi rigs kyi lha la slob bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha ni rang gi rigs kyi lha la slob bzhin pa'o //
translated: One's deity is the deity of one's own family.

original: dang po zhes pa ni der gsungs pa'i 'dus par gyur nas zhes pa sbyar bar byas so //
analyzed: dang po zhes pa ni der gsungs pa'i 'dus par gyur nas zhes pa sbyar bar byas so //
translated: The first is to be supplied with the phrase having gathered together, as stated there.

original: snying po ni a'a li k'a li bsdus pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snying po ni a'a li k'a li bsdus pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The essence is the nature of the collection of the vowels and consonants.

original: gsal bar byas pa ni rab tu rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsal bar byas pa ni rab tu rtogs pa'o //
translated: The clarified is the fully understood.

original: sku la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa nyid kyi phyir sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa nyid kyi phyir sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The body, etc., are stated as body, etc., because they have the nature of the body, etc.

original: dngos grub chen po ni ral gri'i dngos grub la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can dngos grub chen po brgyad do //
analyzed: dngos grub chen po ni ral gri'i dngos grub la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can dngos grub chen po brgyad do //
translated: The eight great powers are the great powers, characterized by the power of the sword, etc.

original: de'i thabs ni de 'grub pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de'i thabs ni de 'grub pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: The means of that is the cause of its accomplishment.

original: mchog ni de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog ni de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The supreme is the means of accomplishing Buddhahood after that.

original: snang ba'i ye shes ni chung ngu yin pa'i phyir dang / snang ba nye bar thob pa ni gti mug gi bdag nyid can nyid yin pas de'i phyir de dag la ltos nas /
analyzed: snang ba'i ye shes ni chung ngu yin pa'i phyir dang / snang ba nye bar thob pa ni gti mug gi bdag nyid can nyid yin pas de'i phyir de dag la ltos nas /
translated: The light intuition is small, and the attainment of light is the nature of delusion, therefore, in dependence on those,

original: shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he declares, ‚Äúwisdom,‚Äù etc.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo snang ba kun du gsal ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo snang ba kun du gsal ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The nature of supreme joy is the nature of the manifestation of light.

original: de'i zhes pa ni mchog tu dga' ba byung ba las te /
analyzed: de'i zhes pa ni mchog tu dga' ba byung ba las te /
translated: ‚Äú From that‚Äù means from the arising of supreme joy,

original: snang ba dang snang ba nye bar thob pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: snang ba dang snang ba nye bar thob pa ni ma yin no //
translated: not from light and the attainment of light.

original: de la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: de la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir //
translated: Because of just that dependence,

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang chen po la ltos pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang chen po la ltos pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is dependent on the nature of the Great Vajradhara, who is the essence of supreme joy.

original: gsung bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gsung bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the speech, he says:

original: lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje rnams ni lus la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje rnams ni lus la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The vajras of body, speech, and mind are the body, etc.

original: 'di'i don 'chad pa sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams @112a * //
analyzed: 'di'i don 'chad pa sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams @112a * //
translated: The meaning of this is explained:üîΩThe cultivation of the body, speech, and mind

original: bsgom pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi tshul gyis zhes pa rnam par 'grel lo //
analyzed: bsgom pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi tshul gyis zhes pa rnam par 'grel lo //
translated: is the body, speech, and mind.

original: bsgom pa zhes pa 'di'i bshad pa ni /
analyzed: bsgom pa zhes pa 'di'i bshad pa ni /
translated: The cultivation is explained as

original: yongs su shes pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su shes pa zhes pa'o //
translated: the thorough knowledge.

original: de lta bu'i sku dang gsung dang thugs bsgom pa gang yin pa de bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sku dang gsung dang thugs bsgom pa gang yin pa de bya'o //
translated: One should do that cultivation of the body, speech, and mind.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: rnam par mi rtog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
translated: He says, non-conceptually, etc.

original: rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa ji lta bur 'gyur ba de lta bur bya'o zhes bya ba'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa ji lta bur 'gyur ba de lta bur bya'o zhes bya ba'i khyad par ro //
translated: One should do it in such a way that it is non-conceptually, non-apprehensively.

original: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not the intended meaning.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa la sogs pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas spyan ma la sogs pa mnyes par byas par gyur to zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa la sogs pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas spyan ma la sogs pa mnyes par byas par gyur to zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By ‚Äúperfection‚Äù and so forth, it is said that having entered into the meditative concentration of Vairochana and so forth, they were pleased by Lochana and so forth.

original: mnyes par byed pa de nyid rdo rje ste /
analyzed: mnyes par byed pa de nyid rdo rje ste /
translated: That very pleasing is the vajra,

original: bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: because it is the nature of the non-dual two truths.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo yin pas zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo yin pas zhes gsungs so //
translated: For that very reason, it is said to be the nature of fearlessness.

original: sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni sems ni gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir zung 'jug gi ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni sems ni gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir zung 'jug gi ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: One-pointed mind is the meditative concentration of union, because the mind is the nature of the innate.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po ni drug pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po ni drug pa'o //
translated: The sixth is Great Vajradhara.

original: de rnams ni zhes pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de rnams ni zhes pa la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúThose‚Äù and so forth.

original: lhan cig spyod pa ni spyan ma la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: lhan cig spyod pa ni spyan ma la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The companions are Lochana and so forth.

original: sogs pa'i sgra las rjes su spyod pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams bsdus te de rnams pho nya mo dang bran mo dang gar ma la sogs pa'i khyad par du bya ste phye ba des dbye ba la sogs pa rnams kyis so zhes bya ba'i don
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgra las rjes su spyod pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams bsdus te de rnams pho nya mo dang bran mo dang gar ma la sogs pa'i khyad par du bya ste phye ba des dbye ba la sogs pa rnams kyis so zhes bya ba'i don
translated: The meaning is that they are distinguished by those categories and so on.

original: to // 'dun pa'i go rims dang / mngon par 'dod pa'i rim gyis so //
analyzed: to // 'dun pa'i go rims dang / mngon par 'dod pa'i rim gyis so //
translated: The order of the desire is the order of the desired.

original: de'i zhes pa ni bya ba'i'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes pa ni bya ba'i'o //
translated: ‚Äú Of that‚Äù is the object of the action.

original: shub bu dang man ngag gis so //
analyzed: shub bu dang man ngag gis so //
translated: ‚Äú Whispered‚Äù is by means of the oral instructions.

original: 'dus dang zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs bya ba'i dbang gis gcig tu 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus dang zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs bya ba'i dbang gis gcig tu 'dus pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Assembly‚Äù is the gathering of the assembly of yogins and yoginƒ´s by the power of the action.

original: go rims ni 'dus pa rnams kyis ji ltar bstan pa'i tha snyad kyis rab tu 'jug pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: go rims ni 'dus pa rnams kyis ji ltar bstan pa'i tha snyad kyis rab tu 'jug pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Order‚Äù is the order of engagement by the conventions of the assembly.

original: de nyid rtogs pa'i go rims sam dkyil 'khor la sogs pa gsungs pa rnams kyang rung ste /
analyzed: de nyid rtogs pa'i go rims sam dkyil 'khor la sogs pa gsungs pa rnams kyang rung ste /
translated: That is the order of realization.

original: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa gsungs pa rnams kyi'ang rang gi ngo bo ni de nyid do //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa gsungs pa rnams kyi'ang rang gi ngo bo ni de nyid do //
translated: The essence of the mandalas, etc. that are taught is just that.

original: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyir byung bar gyur to zhes pa ni phyi rol nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyir byung bar gyur to zhes pa ni phyi rol nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Such and so forth. They became external means that they are external.

original: rgyab kyis phyogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sgrub pa po la zhes mngon par dgongs so zhes bya ba'i sgra phyis nges par @112b bstan no zhes pa ni sngar gsungs pa mchog tu 'dzin no zhes byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa'o
analyzed: rgyab kyis phyogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sgrub pa po la zhes mngon par dgongs so zhes bya ba'i sgra phyis nges par @112b bstan no zhes pa ni sngar gsungs pa mchog tu 'dzin no zhes byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa'o
translated: They turned their backs on the adepts, that is the idea. The word only is taught later.

original: // rol pa'i sgo nas zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rol pa lta bu rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo ston pa /
analyzed: // rol pa'i sgo nas zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rol pa lta bu rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo ston pa /
translated: The door of play is the teaching of the essence of the Tathagatas, who are like play.

original: spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho ba'i rgyu ni de ma thag tu gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho ba'i rgyu ni de ma thag tu gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The reason for not looking on is just stated.

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni byon cing zhes pa yang dag par bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni byon cing zhes pa yang dag par bskyed pa'o //
translated: All and so forth. They came means they were generated.

original: gshegs pa ni sku las zhes pa spyi bo las so //
analyzed: gshegs pa ni sku las zhes pa spyi bo las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom the body‚Äù means from the head.

original: gsung las zhes pa mgrin pa las so //
analyzed: gsung las zhes pa mgrin pa las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom the speech‚Äù means from the throat.

original: thugs las zhes pa snying ga las so //
analyzed: thugs las zhes pa snying ga las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom the mind‚Äù means from the heart.üîΩ‚ÄúFrom these places‚Äù means from these locations.

original: gnas 'di rnams las phyung bar gyur to zhes pa spros par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gnas 'di rnams las phyung bar gyur to zhes pa spros par gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving come forth‚Äù means having emerged.

original: ci ltar spros par gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar spros par gyur zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúIn what way?‚Äù

original: tshig gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: tshig gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The verse beginning with ‚Äúwords‚Äù is stated.

original: ci lta bu'i tshig ce na /
analyzed: ci lta bu'i tshig ce na /
translated: What kind of words?

original: thugs dang sku la ltos pa'i gsung ste /
analyzed: thugs dang sku la ltos pa'i gsung ste /
translated: Speech that is dependent on the mind and body.

original: gang du thugs dang sku bdag gis rab tu sbyor ba de ru gsung sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: gang du thugs dang sku bdag gis rab tu sbyor ba de ru gsung sbyor ba'o //
translated: Wherever the mind and body are applied, there speech is applied.üîΩWhat kind of speech?

original: ci lta bu ni slar yang brjod par bya ba ci zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ci lta bu ni slar yang brjod par bya ba ci zhes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAgain, what is to be said?‚Äù

original: bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning zhes pa la sogs pa ni bsdus par gyur pa zhes pa ni a'a li k'a li dang rnam par shes pa bsdus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dang yi ge rnams de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir yi ge gsum mo
analyzed: bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning zhes pa la sogs pa ni bsdus par gyur pa zhes pa ni a'a li k'a li dang rnam par shes pa bsdus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dang yi ge rnams de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir yi ge gsum mo
translated: ‚ÄúFemale, male, and neuter‚Äù and so on are the three letters because they are the collection of the vowels and consonants and the consciousnesses, and the letters are their nature.

original: // gsungs tsam gyis zhes pa ni brjod par byas pa'i skad cig la zhes pa ni mngon du ston par byed pa'i dus la ltos nas 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: // gsungs tsam gyis zhes pa ni brjod par byas pa'i skad cig la zhes pa ni mngon du ston par byed pa'i dus la ltos nas 'di gsungs so //
translated: Just by saying means in the moment of speaking.  In the moment of manifesting means in dependence on the time of manifesting.

original: gzigs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzigs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Seeing and so forth.

original: ci ltar gzigs pa tsam gyis rgyal bar gyur pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar gzigs pa tsam gyis rgyal bar gyur pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that one does not become a victor merely by seeing?

original: de'i phyir de'i khyad par ston par byed pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i khyad par ston par byed pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, in order to teach its distinction, it is said Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: rigs thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs lnga'o //
analyzed: rigs thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs lnga'o //
translated: All families are the five families of Vairochana and so forth.

original: de'i bdag po'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag po'o //
translated: He is their lord.

original: dga' ba rgya chen po ni kun tu rangs pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba rgya chen po ni kun tu rangs pa'o //
translated: Great joy is complete delight.

original: 'da' bar mi bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'da' bar mi bya ba ni /
translated: Not to be transgressed means

original: 'dus pa pa rnams kyis rim pa las 'da' bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa pa rnams kyis rim pa las 'da' bar mi bya'o //
translated: that the assembled ones should not transgress the sequence.

original: gnas pa zhes pa ni sgrub pa'i thabs las gsungs pa'i rim pas so//
analyzed: gnas pa zhes pa ni sgrub pa'i thabs las gsungs pa'i rim pas so//
translated: Abiding means by the sequence taught in the sƒÅdhana.

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis zhes pa gsum po 'di rnams gang yin pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis zhes pa gsum po 'di rnams gang yin pa ni /
translated: By their own nature means these three.

original: gang gi bdag nyid gang yin pa de rang gi ngo bos te thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi bdag nyid gang yin pa de rang gi ngo bos te thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: That which is of such and such a nature is by its own nature, that is, by its uncommon form.

original: gang yang sgrub pa po'i rang gi ngo bos so //üîΩrdo rje zhes pa la sogs pas ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag @113a * //
analyzed: gang yang sgrub pa po'i rang gi ngo bos so // rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pas ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag @113a * //

original: nyid can 'od zer lnga dang ldan par gsungs so //
analyzed: nyid can 'od zer lnga dang ldan par gsungs so //
translated: By ‚Äúvajra‚Äù and so forth, the concentration being is said to be of the nature of the five transcendent lords, endowed with five light rays.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhes pa ni yang dag par rtogs pa rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi nus pa ni sku la sogs pa'i stobs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhes pa ni yang dag par rtogs pa rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi nus pa ni sku la sogs pa'i stobs so //
translated: ‚ÄúOf the buddhas‚Äù means the power of the body, speech, and mind of the perfect buddhas is the strength of the body and so forth.

original: bcug pa tsam nyid kyis zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis bcug pas rnal 'byor pa dang lhan cig tu gyur pa de'i bdag nyid las so //
analyzed: bcug pa tsam nyid kyis zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis bcug pas rnal 'byor pa dang lhan cig tu gyur pa de'i bdag nyid las so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy mere insertion‚Äù means that by the insertion of the power of the transcendent lords, the practitioner becomes one with them, from the nature of that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: For that very reason, ‚Äúall‚Äù and so forth is stated.

original: mnyes par byed pa'i phyir ni rjes su chags pa skyed par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mnyes par byed pa'i phyir ni rjes su chags pa skyed par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIn order to please‚Äù means in order to generate passion.

original: rgyal po ni drug pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal po ni drug pa'o //
translated: The king is the sixth.

original: sku'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sku'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mandala of the body is so called because it is the abode of the Tathagatas.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni 'gugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni 'gugs pa'o //
translated: This is the one who is summoned.

original: brten par gyur pa ni mi slu bar gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brten par gyur pa ni mi slu bar gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The one who is firm is so called because he is non-deceptive.

original: bsdus pa zhes pa la sogs pas bkug pa zhes pa 'dir byed pa la l'uta ston par byed do //
analyzed: bsdus pa zhes pa la sogs pas bkug pa zhes pa 'dir byed pa la l'uta ston par byed do //
translated: The one who is summoned is shown by the word ‚Äúhaving summoned‚Äù in the verse, which has the causal affix ·∏∑ut.

original: thugs kyi dam tshig ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: thugs kyi dam tshig ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The pledge of mind is Akshobhya.

original: 'di gtso bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di gtso bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: shar la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su zhes pa ni /
analyzed: shar la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su zhes pa ni /
translated: In the places of the east and so forth

original: gtso bo'i shar la sogs pa'i gnas bzhi po rnams su'o //
analyzed: gtso bo'i shar la sogs pa'i gnas bzhi po rnams su'o //
translated: means in the four places of the east and so forth of the chief one.

original: ji ltar gsungs pa ni sgrub pa'i thabs su'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gsungs pa ni sgrub pa'i thabs su'o //
translated: Just as it is taught means in the means of achievement.

original: phyag la sogs pa zhes pa'i sgra las zhal dang mtshan ma la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: phyag la sogs pa zhes pa'i sgra las zhal dang mtshan ma la sogs pa gzung ngo //

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'o zhes pa ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags bar ma'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'o zhes pa ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags bar ma'o //
translated: Attachment and so on means attachment, non-attachment, and middling attachment.

original: de rnams kyis nye bar mtshon par byas pa ni /
analyzed: de rnams kyis nye bar mtshon par byas pa ni /

original: rang gis yang dag par rig par byas nas so //
analyzed: rang gis yang dag par rig par byas nas so //

original: rig pa'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rig pa'i sbyor ba'o //

original: yi ge gsum gyis zhes bya ba ni aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba 'dis so //
analyzed: yi ge gsum gyis zhes bya ba ni aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba 'dis so //

original: spro bar bya ste ni byang chub kyi sems las rdzogs pa phyi rol du bya ba'o //
analyzed: spro bar bya ste ni byang chub kyi sems las rdzogs pa phyi rol du bya ba'o //
translated: One should emanate, that is, complete the bodhicitta externally.

original: dkyil 'khor gzhan du yang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lus nyid do //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gzhan du yang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lus nyid do //
translated: In another mandala, it is the very body of Vairochana and so on.

original: dbyer med pas zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dbyer med pas zhes pa ni /
translated: By indivisibility means

original: dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor par gsungs pas gang yin pa la'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor par gsungs pas gang yin pa la'o //

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku la ni /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku la ni /

original: dkyil 'khor las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: there is no mandala deity other than the mandala.

original: snying ga'i zhes pa ni dam tshig sems dpa'i snying ga'i dbus su chud pa'o //
analyzed: snying ga'i zhes pa ni dam tshig sems dpa'i snying ga'i dbus su chud pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúheart‚Äù is the center of the heart of the pledge-being.

original: thugs ka zhes pa la sogs pa der zla ba la gnas pa'i @113b ye shes sems dpa' ston par byed do //
analyzed: thugs ka zhes pa la sogs pa der zla ba la gnas pa'i @113b ye shes sems dpa' ston par byed do //
translated: The ‚Äúheart‚Äù and so forth indicate the wisdom-being abiding on the moon.

original: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúheart of the wisdom-being‚Äù is the concentration-being, which is to be visualized. This is stated from the perspective of Vairochana and so forth.

original: phul zhes bya ba la sogs pas mi bskyod pa ston par byed do //
analyzed: phul zhes bya ba la sogs pas mi bskyod pa ston par byed do //
translated: The ‚Äútip‚Äù and so forth indicate Akshobhya.

original: kha rnam par gyes pa'i rdo rje zhes pa ni rtse mo gyes pa'o //
analyzed: kha rnam par gyes pa'i rdo rje zhes pa ni rtse mo gyes pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúdivided-tip vajra‚Äù is the split-tip.

original: lcags kyu zhes bya ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyo'i rnam pas 'gugs par byed pa'o //üîΩbskul bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: lcags kyu zhes bya ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyo'i rnam pas 'gugs par byed pa'o // bskul bar bya ba ni /
translated: The ‚Äúhook‚Äù and so forth indicate the summoning by the form of the light-ray hook of the transcendent ones.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs ka nas 'gugs par byed pa'i don zhes gsungs so ;
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs ka nas 'gugs par byed pa'i don zhes gsungs so ;
translated: The ‚Äúencouraging‚Äù is the meaning of summoning from the hearts of the transcendent ones.

original: ; bsgrub par bya ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni le'u bco brgyad par 'chad par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: ; bsgrub par bya ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni le'u bco brgyad par 'chad par 'gyur ba /
translated: ‚ÄúThe object of attainment‚Äù and so forth will be explained in chapter eighteen:

original: bsgrub bya'i lus gang yin pa yang //üîΩdkyil 'khor rnam par bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i lus gang yin pa yang // dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgom par bya //
translated: ‚ÄúThe body of the object of attainment

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: is to be contemplated as the ma·πá·∏çala.‚Äù

original: rdo rje lcags kyus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúThe vajra hook‚Äù and so forth.

original: rdo rje lcags kyus bskul ba'i 'og tu ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyus bskul ba'i 'og tu ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What should be done after the vajra hook is applied?

original: lha zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: lha zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says ‚Äúthe deity‚Äù and so forth.

original: thugs rdo rje gcig pu nyid ni thugs ni sgrub pa po de thams cad ni /
analyzed: thugs rdo rje gcig pu nyid ni thugs ni sgrub pa po de thams cad ni /
translated: The single mind vajra is the mind.

original: rol mkhan gcig nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: rol mkhan gcig nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe single player‚Äù and so forth

original: rigs lnga la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: rigs lnga la yang sbyar bar bya'o //

original: 'jigs par gyur pa zhes pa ni 'jigs pa gnyis pa'i mang tshig gi mtha'o //
analyzed: 'jigs par gyur pa zhes pa ni 'jigs pa gnyis pa'i mang tshig gi mtha'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe fearful‚Äù is the plural of the second case.

original: gyur pa ni 'da' ba gang yin pa de rnams 'jigs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gyur pa ni 'da' ba gang yin pa de rnams 'jigs par gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe fearful‚Äù is that which has passed.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don bshad pa ni mchog tu 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don bshad pa ni mchog tu 'dzin par byed do //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthus‚Äù and so forth is explained as ‚Äúgrasping the supreme.‚Äù

original: nan tan mi byed pa ni mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nan tan mi byed pa ni mi shes pa'i phyir ro //

original: mi shes pa nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: mi shes pa nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to teach just ignorance, he says, ‚ÄúIf, etc.‚Äù

original: las gang gis ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i bya ba tshogs pa'i dngos grub rim pas sel bar 'dod pa mi 'grub po //
analyzed: las gang gis ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i bya ba tshogs pa'i dngos grub rim pas sel bar 'dod pa mi 'grub po //
translated: By which rite does one not accomplish the desired gradual removal of the power of the aggregate of karma, etc., which is the power of the siddhi of the group of pacifying, etc.?

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: It is just the words.

original: don bshad zin to zhes pa ni drang ba'i don gyi bshad par gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: don bshad zin to zhes pa ni drang ba'i don gyi bshad par gsungs pa'o //
translated: The meaning has been explained‚Äîthis is said to be the explanation of the interpretable meaning.

original: gsang ba ni 'gugs pa'o ;
analyzed: gsang ba ni 'gugs pa'o ;
translated: The secret is the summoning.

original: / de la rab tu zhugs pa las ni mchog tu brtson pa'o //
analyzed: / de la rab tu zhugs pa las ni mchog tu brtson pa'o //
translated: From that, one who is engaged is one who is supremely devoted.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The complete is the nature of all the TathƒÅgatas.

original: yod pa ni yod bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa ni yod bzhin pa'o //
translated: The existent is the existing.

original: sngags kyi dam tshig ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi dam tshig ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'o //
translated: The mantra pledge is the practice of the object of attainment and the means of attainment.

original: 'da' bar @114a * //
analyzed: 'da' bar @114a * //
translated: One should not transgress.

original: mi bya ba ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de rnams sngags kyi dam tshig ste sgrub pa'i thabs ni dbang po gnyis kyi rnam par rtog pa ste de'i 'og tu 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi bya ba ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de rnams sngags kyi dam tshig ste sgrub pa'i thabs ni dbang po gnyis kyi rnam par rtog pa ste de'i 'og tu 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Those which are not to be done, which are not to be transgressed, are the pledges of mantra. The means of accomplishment is the conception of the two organs, because of the clear light which follows.

original: grub par gyur nas zhes bya ba ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can nyid du rdzogs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: grub par gyur nas zhes bya ba ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can nyid du rdzogs par gyur pa'o //
translated: Having become accomplished, means having become perfected in the nature of the two truths.

original: bshad pa'i don 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bshad pa'i don 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate just this meaning of the explanation,

original: don dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: don dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: he says, the ultimate, etc.

original: de yongs su mi spong ba ni de dag yongs su mi spong ba ste /
analyzed: de yongs su mi spong ba ni de dag yongs su mi spong ba ste /
translated: Not abandoning that, means not abandoning them.

original: de'i don gyis sbyor ba des chags pas te rtag tu mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don gyis sbyor ba des chags pas te rtag tu mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: By the meaning of that, one is engaged by attachment, i.e., one is always attached.

original: khams gsum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas zung 'jug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i'o //
analyzed: khams gsum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas zung 'jug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i'o //
translated: The one who is in the absorption of union, by the three realms, etc.,

original: 'gro ba ma lus pa rjes su 'dzin par byed pa nyid kyi rjes su chags pa dang bcas pa gus pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus pa rjes su 'dzin par byed pa nyid kyi rjes su chags pa dang bcas pa gus pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: is the one who is affectionate, who is respectful, because of the nature of embracing all beings without exception.

original: lta bar byed pa phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid kyi lus su shes par bya'o zhes bzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lta bar byed pa phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid kyi lus su shes par bya'o zhes bzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One should understand that the body, which is the nature of the Great Seal, is the seer.

original: cho ga bzhin zhes pa ni dmigs pa ni cho ga'o //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin zhes pa ni dmigs pa ni cho ga'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAccording to the rite‚Äù means that the visualization is the rite.

original: de dang mtshungs par gcig nyid du 'jug go zhes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de dang mtshungs par gcig nyid du 'jug go zhes pa bzhin no //
translated: One should enter into it as being the same as that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsungs so //
translated: For that very reason, it is said, ‚ÄúHere, etc.‚Äù

original: cho ga ni ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga ni ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa'o //
translated: The rite is the generation of the gnosis body.

original: thabs dang bcas pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni de la sgra ji lta ba bzhin du brjod pas thabs lha'i dmigs pas 'od zer bskul ba des /
analyzed: thabs dang bcas pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni de la sgra ji lta ba bzhin du brjod pas thabs lha'i dmigs pas 'od zer bskul ba des /
translated: ‚ÄúTogether with the method,‚Äù etc. means that by the method, the visualization of the deity, the light rays are invoked.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nus pa 'gugs shing 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nus pa 'gugs shing 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: By that, the power of the tathƒÅgatas is drawn in and made to enter.

original: 'bras bu yang thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'bras bu yang thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: And the result is that one becomes a buddha who dominates everything.

original: mchog sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams kyi thabs rig ma'i dbang phyug ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de'i 'og tu dngos grub ces bya ba la sogs pa mngon par brjod pa ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: mchog sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams kyi thabs rig ma'i dbang phyug ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de'i 'og tu dngos grub ces bya ba la sogs pa mngon par brjod pa ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: The accomplishment etc. is the result.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga po rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga po rnams so //
translated: The very state of all the Tathagatas is the five, Vairochana etc.

original: de rnams kyi drung du gnas nas byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang bskur bar byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir thams cad dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi drung du gnas nas byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang bskur bar byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir thams cad dbang bskur ro //
translated: Having remained in their presence, he is consecrated by all because he is consecrated with the consecration of the spirit of enlightenment.

original: des zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa des so //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa des so //
translated: By that, etc. means by that which is the observation of reality.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul lnga po la mchog dang tha ma dang bar ma'i btsun mo rnams so so re rer gnas pa rnams nye bar longs spyod par @114b bya zhing nyams su myong bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul lnga po la mchog dang tha ma dang bar ma'i btsun mo rnams so so re rer gnas pa rnams nye bar longs spyod par @114b bya zhing nyams su myong bar bya'o //
translated: The five objects such as form, are the queens who abide in the supreme, the middling, and the inferior. He should enjoy and experience each one.

original: de la sgrub pa thun mong ba la gnas pa rnams kyi gzugs la sogs pa rnams gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa nyid kyis nyams su myong ngo //
analyzed: de la sgrub pa thun mong ba la gnas pa rnams kyi gzugs la sogs pa rnams gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa nyid kyis nyams su myong ngo //
translated: For those abiding in the common practice, forms and so on are experienced as forms-vajra and so on.

original: mchog sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams ni bden pa gnyis su med pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: mchog sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams ni bden pa gnyis su med pa nyid kyis so //
translated: For those abiding in the supreme practice, they are experienced as the nonduality of the two truths.

original: rnal 'byor pa gnyis kyis bsgoms pa las spro ba yang rnam pa gnyis su spro bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa gnyis kyis bsgoms pa las spro ba yang rnam pa gnyis su spro bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The emanation from the meditation of the two yogas is also emanated in two aspects.

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni phyag rgya chen po dang / dang po'i sbyor ba ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i sbyor bar bshad do //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni phyag rgya chen po dang / dang po'i sbyor ba ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i sbyor bar bshad do //
translated: The union of the great seal and so on is explained as the union of the great seal and so on.

translated: The jewel etc. means that the stage of completion should be applied by the stage of generation.

analyzed: rgyu ni rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dag gis sprul pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //

original: de dag dngos po med pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa ste kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i thob bya yin pa nyid kyi phyir 'bras bu'o //

translated: They are the ultimate truth, which is the meaning of non-entityness, and are the result because they are the objects to be attained of the conventional truth.

original: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //üîΩzhes pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas // zhes pa ni /
translated: By meditating on the three indivisible vajras,

translated: Also, because he is the nature of all tathƒÅgatas, the one who meditates on the indivisibility of the three vajras is the Great Vajradhara.

translated: Since it is taught that even MahƒÅvajradhara is generated by means of mantras, signs, and so forth, he is in all bodies, because he has the nature of the yogi‚Äôs body.

analyzed: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba la chu zla lta bu'i dpes khyab par byed pa'o //
